recipeDescription: A popular milk shake recipe, chocolate milk shake is lip smacking and yet healthy. The delectable milk shake is flavoured with drinking chocolate and sweetened with sweet fresh cream. A perfect cooling and nutrient dense beverage option, especially for children.
preparationMethod: Just put the melted chocolate to and the milk in a mixi.
Shake this mixture for 2-3 minutes in the mixi.
Add ice and serve.

recipeDescription: Tasty and healthy. Easy and simple to make it quickly. Liked by everyone.
preparationMethod: Combine the milk, cocoa powder, melted chocolate and honey in a deep bowl and blend using a hand blender till smooth.
Add some ice and blend again.
Fill the glasses with the chocolate shake and garnish it with the chocolate.
Serve chilled.

recipeDescription: Chocolate / Choco Balls are a divine chocolate recipe with cocoa powder blended with cream, crushed biscuits and chopped pecans. Enjoy this irrestible choco ball as dessert or sweet energy packed snack for children.
preparationMethod: Make the biscuit into powder then add the butter and coco powder and mix well.
Then make small or medium size balls and refridgerate for half an hour or one hour.
Take out and serve.

recipeDescription: A step by step process to bake the best tasting Chocolate Cake with this easy and delicious chocolate cake recipe. Enjoy the slices of freshly baked chocolate cake with tea or as dessert with icing of choice.
preparationMethod: Take the chocolate mix in a bowl and mix water,oil and eggs.
Beat them with an electric beater.
Season the pan and pour the mixture.

recipeDescription: Nice to serve to kids........
preparationMethod: Preheat oven to 180°c. line a 3cm deep, 28 x 18cm (base) lamington pan.
Combine all base ingredients in a bowl. mix well. press into prepared lamington pan. bake for 15 to 20 minutes, or until light golden. remove from oven. cool.

Make filling: combine all ingredients in a saucepan over medium heat. cook, whisking, for 8 minutes or until golden. pour over cooked base. bake for 12 minutes or until firm. cool completely. refrigerate for 3 to 4 hours, or until set.
Make topping: place cocoa and chocolate into a heat-proof bowl over a saucepan of simmering water. stir until melted. pour over caramel. refrigerate to set. cut into squares to serve

recipeDescription: Serve chilled
preparationMethod: Heat it

recipeDescription: Sandwiches very popular and famous amongst all of us, here is chocolate and fruit grilled sandwich with the combination of fresh fruits and chocolate jam. Sandwiches are more favourite amongst kids, so here is sandwich which your kids would love to eat, it can be served as a breakfast too.
preparationMethod: Remove the edges of the bread slices and keep aside.
Apply a little butter on one side of all the slices.
Put one slice on clean surface.
Apply 2 tsp of chocolate jam.
Sprinkle 2 cubes grated cheese over it.
Cover with the other slice. Apply butter on it.
Put 3 tsp of prepared stuffing.
Cover with 3rd slice. Apply 1 tsp of butter on top of the sandwich.
Keep it in a pre-heated griller and grill for 5 minutes.
Remove from the griller, cut into 4 pieces.
Serve immediately.
Prepare remaining sandwiches.
This sandwich can be served hot with any fruity drink.
You can prepare this sandwich using fruity bread also, then in this case grilling is not required.

recipeDescription: A popular milk shake recipe, chocolate thick shake is lip smacking and yet healthy. The delectable milk shake is flavoured with chocolate. A perfect cooling and nutrient dense beverage option, especially for children.
preparationMethod: Blend a large peice of leftover chocolate cake with chilled milk with an electric blender decorate with cherry and chocolate flakes
Serve immidiately .

recipeDescription: 1)if the dough is too thin in consistency then add some more coconut powder. 2)if making these for children then you can also add chocolate chips to the dough.
preparationMethod: Put the marie biscuits and crush them in a mixer forming a course powder
Add the biscuit powder, coconut powder and cocoa powder in a mixing bowl. leave out some coconut powder for garnishing.
When the above is thoroughly mixed add some elaichi powder for taste. this can also be left out if you do not like elaichi flavour.
Add the milkmaid into the powder mixture. add enough quantity to form a nice dough like consistency.
Take small portions of the above mixture and form balls out of it. roll this ball in the remaining coconut mixture so that it is nicely covered in coconut.
Place these balls in a tray. put a raisin on each ball and sprinkle some more coconut powder on top.
Keep the tray in the refrigerator for about 5-10minutes. serve whenever and wherever you like to!

recipeDescription: We have tried a lots of savory flavours of dosas, but here is dosa that can be served as a sweet dish loaded with lots of Vitamins and Yuminess. Chocolate truffle sauce gives it an entirely different taste and will be loved by kids, as no kid can say no to chocolate.
preparationMethod: Heat the cream/milk in a non-stick pan.Switch off the gas.
Add the chocolate and mix well till thick. Keep aside to cool.
Heat a non-stick tava (griddle), sprinkle a little water and wipe it off gently using a cloth.
Pour a half a cup of the batter on it and spread it in a circular motion to make a thick circle, so that when we load it with fruits it doesn't break.
Smear little unsalted butter over it and along the edges and cook on medium flame to make a soft light brown dosa.

Take it on a plate and let it cool for 2 minutes. Spread some chocolate truffle sauce evenly all over the dosa, place some fruits on one end of the dosa , top it up with a few cashewnuts and raisins and roll it up.
Drizzle some chocolate truffle Sauce in a zig zag pattern on the stuffed dosa.
Cut it into pieces and serve immediately.

recipeDescription: Alternative: instead of deep frying the kabab you can fry it on a high flame and remove it to bake it in the oven at 260.c
preparationMethod: Often wondered what to do about left over chole, well you can still have it but in a different way ..
1. boil the left over chole to dry the excess water if any.
2. grind the chole in the mixer to form a paste.
3. mix bread crumbs into the mixture.
4. add maida if necessary or if the stickiness persists.
5. roll the mixture into small kababs and fry till golden brown .

recipeDescription: An easy dip recipe with the combination of sun-dried tomatoes and pickled cucumbers.
preparationMethod: In a mixing bowl, combine all the ingredients together. Mix well.
Place it in a serving bowl and serve immediately or chilled with assorted chips,fries and nuggets.

recipeDescription: Chutney sandwich with vegetables stuffed is an healthy sandwich recipe which is sure to be loved by children and is also a great way to add veggies in a child's diet. The chutney is spread on the bread which are filled with veggies, cheese and then toasted with butter.
preparationMethod: Take 2 slices of bread
Cut in to 2 small square shapes
Take one tomato, and 1 cucumber.
Chop them finally into small pieces.
Add 1 spoon of butter on the top of the bread
Add 2 spoons of chutney on the top of both the slices of the bread.
Put cucumber and tomato pieces on the top of both the slices
Put the 2nd slice on the top of the cucumber and tomato
Add 1 pinch of salt and black peper on the bread
And serveo

recipeDescription: A sweet chutney recipe with garlic and chillies, this unusual combination of ingredients make this garlic and chilli chutney an amazing accompaniment to meals or snacks.
preparationMethod: Remove seeds from the dates and tamarind, wash and add 1 teacup of water. leave for 2 hours.
Cook for 5 minutes. thereafter, blend in a liquidiser and strain.
Add the chilli powder, cumin seed powder and salt. mix well.
Use as required.
Grind the chillies and garlic with 1/2 teacup of water.

recipeDescription: Its a desire of each soul to have a beautiful skin. for that you need to keep your skin really clean. this is a homemade cleansing milk. try it and you will find that it not only cleans your skin, but the lime in it also removes unwanted marks on your face. after a face wash, apply a moisturizing cream on your face.
preparationMethod: Take 2 tsp of warm milk. do not take fat less milk.
Add 6-7 drops of lime juice. mix it.
you will find the water and fat seperated. use your finger and apply the seperated fat on your face. apply in upward direction on the face and neck, except your eyes and lips.
After 10 min when the face dries up, reapply it.
after about 1/2 an hour use a wet cotton to clean your face.
finally clean your face with a good facewash. find a clean n clear face.

recipeDescription: A handy recipe to prepare a homemade Cleansing scrub using simple ingredients from your kitchen. The scrub ensures a clean and clear face which is sure to glow.
preparationMethod: Mix honey with finely ground almond paste. add little lime juice. rub gently on your face and neck. rinse off with warm water. this acts as an excellent cleansing scrub.
Dry fry cloves in a kadai, powder it fine add honey and swallow before going to bed this really helps in controlling cough and you get very good sleep!!

recipeDescription: Cocktail chila (tomato and onion omelette) is a healthy and protein rich chila or pancake recipe with gram flour mixed with chopped onions, tomatoes and spice powder,. Cut into small pieces and enjoyed crispy hot with sauce or chutney of choice with your cocktails.
preparationMethod: Comine all ingredients in a bowl, mix well and add 2 cups of water gradually to make a smooth batter of flowing consistency.
Heat a non stick pan and pour a spoonful of batter and spread evenly to make small round pancakes.
Flip over when one side is cooked, using a little oil.
Serve ot hwith mint chutney and tomato sauce.

ingredients: salt freshly ground black pepper powder
recipeDescription: A delicious crunchy snack... blend of crunchy vegetable and cheese!!
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients, except the maida paste, samosa patti and oil, in a bowl and mix well.
Divide the mixture into small round balls and keep aside.
Dip a ball in the maida paste and cover the ball with samosa strip so that it sticks well.
Sprinkle some plain flour and keep aside.
Similarly prepare other balls.
Heat the oil in a kadhai and deep fry the balls till they turn golden brown from all the sides.
Drain on an absorbent paper and serve hot with cocktail!

recipeDescription: A tender coconut water drink recipe, Coco cool is made tangier with a dash of lime juice. Enjoy this refreshing cool drink as mock tail in midmornings or a cocktail starter in the evenings.
preparationMethod: Empty tender coconut water in a vessel
Add juice of half a lime.
Add one table spoon honey.
Add washed and cleaned mint leaves, sparing few for garnish.
Chill the mix.
For serving, use tall glass, remove mint leaves.
Stir and pour the mixture in the glass, garnish the side of the glass with slice of lime, cherry and mint leaves.
Serve immediately.

recipeDescription: An innovative chutney recipe, tasty coconut and coriander chutney with chopped fresh coriander leaves blended with grated coconut, garlic, salt, onion and other spices is an amazing accompaniment to meals or snacks.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients, except the lemon juice, and blend in a mixer into a smooth paste.
Add the lemin juice and mix well.
Serve immediately or store refrigerated.

recipeDescription: the delicious coconut balls is an unique dessert recipe with a delicious combination of cream and coconut together. The children are sure to find this coconut ball recipe amazing.
To break the coconut evenly, leave it in the refrigerator for 2/3hrs and then break it. or else wash it in cold water and break it.
preparationMethod: Nil

recipeDescription: Coconut chutney is a South Indian way of preparing a creamy and spicy coconut chutney or paste with freshly grated coconut . Tasty and easy to prepare coconut chutney can be refrigerated and used as desired as an accompaniment to main course or any starter.
preparationMethod: Grind the 1st five ingredients into a coarse paste by adding little water. heat 1 tsp of oil in a pan and put mustard seeds. pour this on top of the ground paste and mix well.

recipeDescription: Serve cold
preparationMethod: Take out coconut milk from coconut& add some water
Take a frying pan and in it put oil.
Heat it and put cumin seeds,hing and coriender.
Tadka is ready
In the coconut milk add salt to taste and give it a small boil.
Give coconut milk the tadka.

recipeDescription: A must have laddo recipe prepared from freshly grated coconut, the Coconut laddo is commonly enjoyed on festivals or religious ceremonies. The coconut laddoos are an excellent snack item for children and are quite easy to prepare.
preparationMethod: Grate khoya and petha.
Mix grated khoya,petha 1/2 quantity of coconut powder and kewra.
Bind them in the shape of laddoo and wrap the remaining coconut powder on the laddoos.
Mouth watering receipe is ready.

recipeDescription: A step by step process of preparing coconut milk at home. Coconut milk is a necessary ingredient in many cuisines like Thai cuisine, South Indian cuisine and Goan or Konkan cuisine among many more.
preparationMethod: Grind the coconut pieces along with water in mixie.t
Ransfer it to a bowl.
Now filter that into another bowl using a tea filter
Now take the coconut paste remeining in the filter and squeeze again in the filtered coconut milk.
Leave off the coconut paste and use the liquid alone as coconut milk

recipeName: Coconut Sago Pudding with Toasted Coconut
recipeDescription: Coconut Sago Pudding with Toasted Coconut is an unusual pudding for fasting days. Enjoy warm or chilled.
preparationMethod: In a large glass bowl combine sabudana and 1 cup milk,mix well.Cover and chill in the refrigerator overnight or at least for 4 hours.
In a pan combine the remaining milk and chilled sabudana mixture and cook on a medium flame.
Once the pudding comes to a boil add the coconut milk,vanilla and honey. Cook for another 12 to 15 minutes, while stirring continuously.
Lower the flame and add the sabudana powder and cook for 5 more minutes, while stirring continuously.
Pour the pudding in a glass bowl and allow to cool.
Serve warm or chilled garnish with toasted coconut chips.

recipeDescription: If you can start on this medicine when you observe the signs of cold you can completely recover within a day or two. this is a exceptional yet powerful home ailment that anyone can try. for kids reduce the amount of pepper, tulsi leaves and dry ginger to just a pinch of each. you can even try adding a bit more honey for your little ones.
preparationMethod: Grind all the ingreidients together. divide into three portions and take it in 3-4 hours intervals.

recipeDescription: Colocasia roast is a healthy spicy and low in calories vegetable preparation with marinated arbi or colocasia cubes grilled till golden brown. Serve this mildly spiced and flavourful colocasia roast with chopped onion and chillies.
preparationMethod: Wert

recipeDescription: A crispy crunchy healthy and tasteful Colourful smiles are a perfect choice for parties and festivals. The circular shaped bread slices are applied with tomato paste, topped with vegetables and sprinkled with grated cheese.
preparationMethod: Take 4 slices of bread and cut them into circles.
Fry the bread on a low flame till they are light brown.
Take butter in a pan and saute.
Add finely cut onines and saute till light brown.
Add all the capsicums and cook well.
Then add tomatoe puree to the onions.
Cook for some time and then add the tomato sauce.
Add all the boild vegetables and let it cook for some time.
Put salt, grated cheese and chaat masala.
Remove from flame.
Now put this colourful gravy on the fried bread circular slices and decorate it with tomatoes cut in "c" shape(mouth)
And spring onions cut in circles(eyes).
Crispy crunchy healthy and colourful smiles are ready to eat.

recipeDescription: The khus sharbat gives indian tang and kiwi adds to the international flavour while mint gives freshness.
preparationMethod: Pour the khus syrup in the serving glass, put the crushed ice, add 1/4th of lemonade, crushed kiwi and vanilla icecream.
Finally top it again with lemonade.
Garnish with mint leaves.
Serve immediately.

recipeDescription: Cool and healthy drink for summer. . .
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients and blend in a mixer till smooth and mix well.
Serve chilled

recipeDescription: Reenergize your system with a cooling and detoxifying cool mint magic drink. The fresh mint or pudina leaves are blended with honey, lime juice, soda and black salt.
preparationMethod: Blend mint leaves, lemon juice, water, ice cubes, honey and salt in a blender.
Strain to extract the juice.
Finally before serving add chilled soda.

recipeDescription: This is a traditional recipe of chitrapur saraswats. It is a herbal drink.
preparationMethod: Combine the brahmi leaves with cumin-pepper powders and black salt and blend in a mixer to a fine paste.
Add the honey and 2 cups water, mix well and serve chilled.

recipeDescription: To check whether the roll is cooked, piece a knife into it. if it is cook, the material won't stick to the knife.
preparationMethod: Wash the coriander leaves and chopped them finely. in a plate, take the coriander leave, some gram flour, about a cup, half tsp cumin seeds, 1 tsp chilli powder, half tsp garam masala and salt to taste. mix the ingredients gently with hand. and try to make it into dough. if necessary add some more flour. and give the dough the shape of a roll. and
Cut them into thin slices. and shallow fry them.

recipeName: Dark White Chocolate and Coffee Concoction
recipeDescription: Yummy creamy chocolaty drink!
preparationMethod: In a blender, add 30 ml milk and melted dark chocolate, blend till smooth and keep aside.
Combine another 30 ml milk with white chocolate and blend till smooth and keep aside.
Same way, combine the remaining 30 ml milk with coffee powder separately and blend till smooth.
Pour the dark chocolate mix first in a wine glass, followed by the white chocolate mix and top it with the coffee concoction.
Garnish with coffee powder and coffee beans.

recipeDescription: Date cookies are a cookie recipe prepared from soaked dates. An amazing dessert or a delicious tea time snack, crispy and crunchy date cookies is a culinary delight and is sure to be appreciated by all.
preparationMethod: Keep seedless dates in a microwave for 1 minute.
Mix dates, almonds, cashew, marie buiscuits.
Make a roll and cover in a foil and keep in a refridgerator for 15 minutes.
After cooling cut the roll into pieces and serve.

recipeDescription: Sweet, Spicy and Tangy pickle using Dates. Simple to make and can be used as a spread too.
preparationMethod: Heat oil in a pan and add the mustard seeds.When the seeds crackle,add curry leaves and then the ginger-garlic paste. Saute for few seconds until the raw smell goes.
Add about 1/2 cup water and then the dates. When the water boils, reduce the flame, cover and cook. After a few minutes, you can see that the dates are almost cooked.
Now add salt, chilli powder and tamarind extract.Mix well and let the mixture thicken. Finally add asafoetida and mix.
Dates pickle is ready. Once cooled, store in an airtight container and keep refrigerated.

recipeDescription: 1. you can even bake in the microwave instead of frying.
preparationMethod: Chop all the ingredients nicely in very small size.
Heat ghee in vessel add all ingredients.
fry till colur changes and dates are little tender and all ingredients are mixed well.
Take out ingredients on wooden plate and roll with rolling pin like roti.
Then aplly ghee on plams and make a thick roll from roti.
Keep it in freezer to set
Serve making slices of roll.

recipeDescription: Dates, Almond and Nutella Ladoos, are not only kids favourite, but everyone's favorite, as it has a chocolaty flavour and nutty texture which is quite satiating and tasty. A very quick, simple, healthy and tasty anytime snack. Kids will love to have some in their tiffins too.
preparationMethod: Grind the almonds to a powder in a mixer.
Mix the almond powder with chopped dates and nutella.
Use your fingers to combine all the ingridents.
Shape the the mixture into small balls and serve.

recipeDescription: Deep Fried Soybean Snack is made from soaked and deep fried soyabeans - the wonder food that is loaded with health. It is said that for optimal health, eat soya. With just a sprinkling of chili powder, chaat masala and salt it trasforms into a delicious snack. Serve mixed with chopped onions and a spurt of lemon juice to further enhance the taste and flavour of the soya.
preparationMethod: Soak soybeans in water for 8-10 hrs. While soaking add soda.
Drain and dry in the shade for for 1 hour.
Heat oil in the kadhai and deep fry till light brown in colour.
Drain on an absorbent paper and transfer in a bowl.
Add the chilli powder, salt and chaat masala and mix well.
While serving you can add finely chopped onions ,lemon juice and finely chopped coriander leaves.

recipeDescription: A delicious tea. .
preparationMethod: Place the lemon and ginger in a small teapot.
Add the boiled water and pour into the teapot.
Allow the tea to infuse for a few minutes.
Sweeten with honey and serve either warm or chilled.

recipeDescription: A classic bengali sweet delicacy, delightful sandesh is prepared from chenna or freshly prepared cottage cheese. This sandesh recipe is prepared with pista as garnish and can be given any shape and size as per choice and moulds available.
preparationMethod: Grate the petha and keep aside.
Combine all the ingredients, except the coconut, along with petha and mix well.
Divide the mixture into 15 - 20 equal portions and shape them into small oval balls.
Sprinkle the coconut over the balls so that it covers the ball completely.
Sprinkle few more saffron strands on the balls and keep it in the refrigerator for spprox. 20 minutes.
Serve chilled.

recipeDescription: Garlic chutney is a flavorsome blend of garlic or lehsun with spices and salt. A maharashtrian household favorite, lehsun ki chutney or garlic chutney is a great accompaniment to main course meals or snacks.
preparationMethod: Heat 2 tsp oil, add the garlic, red chillies and tomatoes and saute for 5 minutes.
Add the salt and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Heat the remaining oil in a pan and add this ground paste and saute till the mixture becomes thick.
Serve immediately or store refrigerated.

ingredients: sliced tomatoes, sliced olives, chopped capsicum
recipeDescription: You can use different toppings to make it taste your choice. serve hot.
preparationMethod: Place the 2 slices of toasted bread in a dish.
Spread the tomato ketchup.
Spread 1 teaspoon oil on each.
Place the toppings.
Scatter the grated cheese.
Place the dish in the oven for 10 mins .

recipeDescription: Browse through our recipe collection of easy chocolate cake recipes and cake recipes, including our eggless chocolate cake recipe. A lovely easy chocolate cake recipe with a soft texture and awesome taste. Easy chocolate cake may be topped with cream or chocolate sauce.
preparationMethod: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl. make sure there are no lumps . keep stiring in one direction for around 5 mins. grease a cake tin. preheat an oven @180 degrees and then bake the cake for 30 mins or till the cake leaves the sides of the tin.

In magic bullet take the tall jar and cross blade, then add cream, chocolate syrup, grind for 30sec, take out in mouse glass ot martini glass, sprinkle some chocolate chips...keep in freeze for 15-20 min.

recipeDescription: U can also use amul tin cheese but grind it with the egg or grate it.. u can also add some fine chopped capsicum
preparationMethod: Grind or chop the hard boil eggs finely
Chop the onion finely
Mix pepper, chopped onion n chopped egg properly
Spread it on the bread
Place the cheese sclice over it and place it in the sandwich toster till the bread is golden

recipeDescription: Serve with sweet chilli sauce and sour cream. use medium heat to prevent burning.
preparationMethod: Mix all together.
Let stand a couple of minutes.
Pour into lightly greased non stick fry pan.
Cook till golden brown
Turn over and brown other side

recipeDescription: Malai capcicum or capsicum makes for a tasty flavorsome vegetable dish in a rich creamy gravy. Malai capsicum or shimla mirch is a tempting quick capsicum recipe with capsicum, onion, tomatoes, cream (malai) ,indian spice powders and green coriander leaves.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a pan, add the onions and tomatoes and saute till they onions turns golden brown.
Add the capsicum and the remaining ingredients, mix well and cook till the capsicum is soft and tender.
Add the cream and mix well.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: another easy recipes of a quick summer cooler.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients, except the ice and refrigerate to chill.
Serve chilled in tall glasses with lots of crushed ice.

recipeDescription: It is Sev which can be prepared at home and can be preserved or stored for future purpose in a tight ait tight jar.Can be used for Bhel or on any snack.Taste fabulous in rainy season
preparationMethod: Combine the besan, salt, oil, chilli powder and carom seeds in a bowl and mix well.
Add enough water to make a dough which is quite gooey.
Grease the inside of a sev-press, fill with the dough.
Press into hot oil, and deep fry lightly on both sides.
Drain well and cool before storing.

Here is the procedure for saving time in grating the cocunut. grate the fresh coconut and keep it in the freezer. it stays long for more than 10 days. so whenever we need take it from the freezer and allow it to come to room temperature and you can use the grated coconut as it is.

recipeDescription: The all time favorite tomato soup is now made simple and quick to prepare with this easy tomato soup recipe. The thick, tangy and healthy tomato soup is best enjoyed with Toasted Croutons and a dash of coriander leaves. Bruschettas with Tomato and Basil or Garlic Bread, Baked Garlic Bread also goes well as an accompaniment to this ever popular Tomato Soup.
preparationMethod: Combine the tomatoes, onions, garlic and 3 cups of water in a pressure cooker, mix well and pressure cook for 3 whistles.
Allow the steam to escape before opening the lid.
Cool the mixture completely and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Transfer the mixture into a deep non-stick pan, add the butter, salt and pepper, mix well and cook on a medium flame for 3 to 4 minutes, while stirring occasionally.
Serve hot garnished with bread croutons and coriander.

recipeDescription: Easy Yummy Chocolate Sandwich to please your kid's palate. This sandwich is an irresistible finger-licking delicacy with an abundant dose of cheese spread and chocolate spread sandwiched between bread slices and toasted on a tava. Kids love the flavor of this great combo, just watch them lick their plates clean.
preparationMethod: Take one of the bread slice put 1 tsp cheese spread.
Top with 2 tbsp chocolate spread and put the other slice of bread on it.
Heat a non-stick tava and put 1 tbsp of butter on it and toaste the sandwich it till it become golden brown on the either side.
Cut it into 4 pieces and serve.

recipeDescription: Try out this easy, tasty and Economical Chocolate Pudding recipe from a combination of milk, Marie biscuits, chocolate powder and custard powder, the chocolate pudding is sure to win accolades for you.
preparationMethod: Mix all the indegridients together apart from the marie gold biscuits and cook on low flame.
Keep stirring the vessel so that the mixture does not stick to teh utensil.
Keep stirring till it becomes thick.
When its begins to thicken then take it out from the flame.
Allow it to cool for about 5 mins and then add the marie gold biscuits in that by crushing the biscuits into small pieces.
Mix well.
Keep in the freezer and allow it to cool and set for about an hour.
The delicious pudding is ready to eat.

recipeDescription: Bye the time the egg is being cooked u can fry the canapes & keep aside
preparationMethod: Finely chop the onions & tomatoes. saute the onions till pink.
Then add the tomatoes and green chillies & fry well.
Then beat the eggs seperately adding salt & add in the pan.then add salt & dry masalas & cover & let it cook for sometime.
Then fry the canapes & take this mixture & put it in the canapes.
Decorate with some grated cheese & chopped coriander leaves.

recipeDescription: The popular egg bhurjee is an easy way of cooking scrambled eggs with onion, tomato, ginger, chillies and garam masala. The tasty egg bhurji tastes awesome with rotis or naan.
preparationMethod: First beat eggs in a bowl.
Take pan heat oil.
Add onions till golden brown.
Add all masalas.
Then add eggs and lastly tomato and stir well till it seperate into small pieces.
Garnish with coriander and serve with bread or toasted bread.

recipeDescription: #1. remember not to crush the eggs but make small pieces of them.
preparationMethod: Boil the eggs completely, and cut them in very small pieces.
Make very small pieces of green chillies , cucumber , tomatoes.
Mix the eggs, green chillies,tomatoes,cucumber, chopped onion.
Add red chilli powder,black pepper powder to the mixture.
Now, take the slices and spread 1/2 tsp. of cream on one side of each slice
Fill in the mixture of eggs between the two slices.
Cook the sandwich in the toaster by spreading the butter on the other side of the slices , untill the sandwich becomes crispy.

ingredients: cloves (laung / lavang) powder black pepper (kalimirch) powder
recipeDescription: Delicious and spicy recipe made with boiled and grated eggs cooked with chillies, onions, tomatoes and an array of spices.
preparationMethod: Heat oil in a non stick pan add asafoetida(hing)& than add onion to it saute it till it is golden brown.
Add all masala and saute for few seconds.
Add chopped tomatoes and saute till softens.
At last add grated eggs to it and stir it for 5 minutes till oil is seperated,remove from fire.
Serve hot with bread.

recipeDescription: Egg kuruma is a spicy and tasty curry that can be served with chappati or with pulao.
preparationMethod: Add the water and eggs in pan and boil for 10-15 minutes.
Remove the shells and keep aside.
Heat the oil in a kadhai, add the ginger garlic paste, onions, salt and green chillies, mix well and saute till the onions turns golden brown in colour.
Add the coriander powder, garam masala, chilli powder and turmeric powder, mix well and saute for 2 minutes.
Add the tomatoes ,mix well and cook for 2 minutes on a medium flame.
Add the boiled eggs, 1/2 cup water, coconut milk and kaju paste, mix well and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot garnished with curry leaves.

recipeDescription: Egg malai is an easy spicy egg recipe with boiled eggs cooked in a delicious onion tomato mix. The eggs are stir fried in a spicy and creamy gravy and served with roti or paranthas.
preparationMethod: Boil the eggs keep, peel them and cut then into half.
Combine the onions, green chillies and ginger and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Heat the ghee in a pan, add the paste and saute for 2 minutes.
Add the eggs and saute till the onions become brown.
Add the milk and cook till it becomes a little thick.
Add the salt, boil the milk and add the garam masala and mix well.
Serve hot garnished with coriander.

recipeName: Egg Noodles, Spicy Maggi Egg Noodles
recipeDescription: spicy egg maggi noodles recipe | egg masala maggi | egg maggi noodles | street style maggi | with amazing 20 images. Get ready to dish out the spicy egg maggi noodles within minutes by simply cooking Maggi noodles with beaten eggs and vegetables. A smart way of adding nutrients in a child's favourite noodle recipe. Sometimes, plain maggi might feel boring so we have got you a very famous Mumbai street style maggi recipe which is egg masala maggi which none can resist having. I remember having egg maggi noodles on my trip to Lonavala. Hot egg maggi noodles with a cup of tea in the cold weather between mountains was heavenly. spicy egg maggi noodles makes a filling snack, you can definitely rely on this recipe for midnight cravings or sudden hunger pangs. Also, when i am in a hurry egg maggi becomes my quick lunch! The process and method of making egg masala maggi is super easy and quick! We have started by boiling noodles, once the noodles are boiled we have drained them and kept aside. Further, heat oil in a pan, add onions followed by green chilies and ginger. These 3 ingredients also play a major role in enhancing the taste of anda maggi. Next, we have added turmeric to give our egg maggi noodles a vibrant color followed by maggi tastemaker. Further, we have added beaten eggs and cooked them well. Once the eggs are cooked well, add the drained maggi noodles and mix well. Our supremely delicious egg maggi noodles is ready to be relished!! Enjoy spicy egg maggi noodles recipe | egg masala maggi | egg maggi noodles | street style maggi | with detailed step by step recipe below.
preparationMethod: Boil enough water in a saucepan, add the maggi noodles, mix well and cook on a medium flame for 3 minutes, while stirring occasionally. Drain.
Beak the eggs in a deep bowl and mix well using a whisk. Keep aside.
Heat the oil in a broad non-stick pan, add the onions, green chillies and ginger and sauté on a medium flame for 1 minute.
Add the turmeric powder, maggi taste maker, salt and coriander, mix well and cook on a medium flame for 2 minutes, while stirring occasionally.
Add the whisked eggs, mix well and cook on a medium flame for 1 minute, while stirring continuously.
Add the cooked noodles, mix well and cook on a medium flame for 1 minute, while stirring continuously.
Serve the spicy egg maggi noodles immediately.

recipeDescription: Egg onion bhurjee is the traditional way of cooking scrambled eggs with onion, tomato, ginger, chillies and garam masala. The tasty egg onion bhurji tastes awesome with rotis or naan.
preparationMethod: First boil the eggs.
Then smash all into one.
Cut onions into small pieces.
Make paste of two onions in a mixer.
Put the items in kadai and fry for 10 mins alongwith sliced chillies.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Egg Pakoda it is a easy and quick pakodas. Children's will love it.
preparationMethod: Remove the shell of the boiled eggs. Firstly cut the egg into half, then cut each half of the egg into 4 stripes lengthwise. Remove the yellow of the egg.
Combine the besan, salt, chilli powder, baking powder and little water in a bowl and mix well to make smooth batter.
Heat the oil in a kadhai, dip each egg white strips in the batter and put in hot oil and deep-fry it till the pakodas turn brown in colour from all the sides.
Serve hot with tomato sauce.

recipeDescription: Amazing breakfast to make you day.

Microwave uncovered for 2 minutes.

Pour the eggs on wafers.

Remove and sprinkle cheese and microwave for 1 minute.

Serve hot.

Keep aside
Now heat oil in kadaai and fry onions...then add coriander leaves n spring onions n fry
Now add sauces n saute well
Now add vegetables salt n pepper n fry well

Serve hot

recipeDescription: A diabetic friendly salad recipe with methi seeds or fenugreek, Fenugreek salad is bitter in taste but high in nutritive values. Add a dash of lime juice and salt to the fenugreek salad and enjoy it as a side dish.
preparationMethod: Clean, wash and cut finely fenugreek leaves.
Wash and cut tomatos in small pieces.
Cut spring onions also in small pieces.
Finely chopp green chillies.
Mix them all together while serving add salt, oil & red chillie powder.

recipeDescription: You can use any milk (low fat, fat free or regular milk)

In a pan add butter let it melt and then add onion let the onion cook until transparent
Add whipping cream or milk, sali and pepper mix well.
Add the cooked pasta in the pan mix them all together adjust the taste by adding some ingredients. take it in a plate then garnish by

recipeDescription: Enjoy Fettuccine delight, a delightful pasta recipe prepared by tossing boiled fettuccine pasta with cream , cheese and choicest herbs.
preparationMethod: Boil 3 litres of water for pasta and cook until tender.
Drain in a colander and return to pan.
While the pasta is cooking, heat butter in a medium pan over low heat.
Add parmesan cheese and cream. add parsley ,salt and pepper and stir to combine.
Add to pasta and toss well and serve immediately.
Garnish with grated parmesan.

recipeDescription: Figs & Dates Burfi is a nutrient packed mouthwatering dessert recipe with figs or Anjeer cooked with dates and then served cut into small squares.
preparationMethod: Soak dried figs in two cups of water for three to four hours.
Drain and make a puree using a little water if required.
Alternatively, place dried figs in one cup of hot water for two to three minutes. drain and let cool. make a puree using a little water if required.
Chop seedless dates and place in half a cup of hot water for fifteen to twenty minutes.
Make a puree. alternatively, cook dates in a microwave oven on microwave high (100%) for thirty seconds and make a puree using a little water if required.
Chop almonds, cashewnuts and pistachios fine. grease a tray.
Heat ghee in a pan. add fig puree and dates puree. stir well and cook on medium heat, stirring continuously, for ten to fifteen minutes or till excess moisture dries up.
Add almonds, cashewnuts and pistachios. mix well and continue to cook for ten to fifteen minutes, stirring continuously.
The mixture will begin to leave the sides of the pan.
Spread evenly on the greased tray. cover with silver warq.
When cool, cut into pieces and serve.

ingredients: green chillies, cut into small pieces
recipeDescription: Always use low fat cheese as to cut down the calories serve it accompanied by a green salad
preparationMethod: Preheat the grill
Mix the chopped tomatoes capsicums and onion in a bowl.
Add the tomato ketchup mixed herbs and season with salt and pepper
Wet the pitta bread with a wet hand warm it in the grill on both sides
Take them out and cut the top end off the pitta bread
Fill the pitta bread with the mixture and also the green chillies if using them
Top the mixture in each pitta bread with 1 tablespoon of cheese and put them all under the grill till the cheese melts.
Serve hot with chilli sauce

recipeDescription: These leaves increases the digestion. It is very useful in Ayurvedic medicine. It relives cold and cough.

recipeDescription: Colorful tasty and fresh taste.

ingredients: salt freshly ground black pepper (kalimirch) powder
recipeDescription: The versatile tomatoes can be made into a delectable sauce, Fresh summer tomato sauce which can be stored for upto ten days and enjoyed as desired.
preparationMethod: Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil in a small skillet. add the garlic and onion and sauté over medium-low heat until golden.

In a food processor, combine the garlic-onion mixture with the remaining oil, tomatoes, dried tomatoes, basil, oregano, lemon juice, and optional capers. process, pulsing on and off, until the mixture is coarsely and evenly chopped, but not pureed.
Toss with hot or cold pasta, season to taste with salt and pepper, and serve.

recipeDescription: Prepare the tempting fried arbi with chopped colocasia or arbi and enjoy with roti or as a starter. The spiced arbi are fried and then served crispy hot.
preparationMethod: Boil arbi in pressure cooker for 1 whistle, cool and peel the arbis.
Heat the oil in a kadhai and deep fry the arbi till they turn golden brown in colour.
Press all fried arbis one by one with a katori and keep aside.
Heat 1 tsp oil in another kadai and add the asafoetida and carom seeds.
Put the pressed arbi and add all the masalas and mix well.
Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Serve hot with plain parathas.

ingredients: green chillies, deseeded and finely chopped
recipeDescription: Fried cheese sandwiches is a tempting deep fried crsipy bread based snack dish. The bread slices are buttered and topped with cheese slices and tomato. These sandwiches are then dipped in a spicy egg mixture and deep fried. Serve them hot with tomato sauce.
preparationMethod: Make a batter by beating the eggs, milk, pepper and salt and keep aside.
Apply butter on the bread slices.
Use four slices of bread and place a cheese slice, followed by a tomato slice and sprinkle the green chilies on it.
Now place the remaining four slices of bread individually on the above.
Cut each sandwich into two triangular pieces.
Dip the sandwich pieces into the egg batter.
Heat some oil in a non-stick frying pan and lightly fry the sandwiches till golden brown.
Serve hot with tomato sauce.

recipeDescription: A delicious crunchy hot snack to be enjoyed with tea or coffee. A simple way to use left over idlis.

preparationMethod: Mix the limca, lemon juice and ice-cream and blend for 1 min in a liquidiser

2. serve immediately.

Of butter.

Next grill the rolls until the cheese has melted.
Sprinkle it with salt and pepper.

ingredients: salt, chilli powder black pepper (kalimirch) powder
recipeDescription: Here is the recipe to create the crispy fried garlic flavoured Garlic sev. The crunchy sev has a delectable garlic flavour and is best enjoyed as snack with onion, tomatoes and chillies tossed over the garlic sev.

recipeDescription: Spruce up the nutrient content of your diet with this healthy and tempting palak paneer recipe. The spinach or palak puree is cooked with garlic and chillies and then mixed with paneer cubes. The palak paneer is best paired with rotis or naans
preparationMethod: Combine the ginger-garlic paste, green chilli paste and spinach with some water and pressure cook for about 7-8 minutes (just before the first whistle).
Remove, cool and blend in a mixer till smooth and keep aside.
Heat the oil in a kadhai and deep fry the paneer pieces till they turn slightly brown.
Drain on an absorbent paper and keep aside.
Heat 2 tbsp of butter in a pan, add the bay leaves and cumin seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add onions and saute till the onions become pink.
Add salt, black pepper, garam masala and mix well.
Add the paneer and spinach, mix well and cook for 1 minutes.
Transfer in a baking tray and bake for 30 minutes at 180 degree c.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Ghobi ke pakore is something which everyone would like to have in rainy season when served piping hot with chilli sauce and hot tea.
preparationMethod: Combine the besan, green chilli, lemon juice, salt, turmeric powder and red chilli powder in a bowl, mix well and add enough water to make a batter of pouring consistency.
Cover and keep aside for 5 to 7 minutes.
Heat the oil in a kadhai and dip each cauliflower floret in the batter and deep fry till they turn golden and crisp from all the sides.
Drain on an absorbent paper and serve hot.

recipeDescription: A delicious crunchy snack!
preparationMethod: Combine the plain flour, salt and butter and knead well till the mixture resembles bread crumbs.
Add the ginger paste and green chilli paste and mix well.
Slowly add water to make a little hard dough and keep it covered for a while with a damp cloth.
Pinch out small balls from the dough and roll out into small discs evenly and keep it aside.
Place a skillet with 1 cup oil on a medium flame and add the prepared discs in batches and fry on high flame till crispy and brown on both the sides.
Serve hot or cool and store in an air tight containers.

recipeDescription: A sweet and sour pickle made with ginger pieces in a mix of variousspices and condiments.
preparationMethod: Finely chop the ginger, put into a bowl.
Now pour the lemon juice over the ginger in the bowl.
Add honey and a pinch of salt.
Stir well and store in a tight glass bottle.

recipeDescription: Colour becomes fair soon.
preparationMethod: Dry roast sarsso seeds ,powder it,make paste with milk apply get a soothing effect.

recipeDescription: The mouthwatering gobi mussallam is truly an amazing cauliflower recipe. A simple, irrestible choice of masala with gobi makes it a special dish which is best devoured with Parathas and salad.
preparationMethod: Remove stalk from cauliflower. boil in salted water with 1 teaspoon turmeric powder till half cooked.
Heat oil in a kadhai. add grated onions and sauté until golden brown in colour.
Add ginger paste, garlic paste, cumin powder, coriander powder, remaining turmeric powder, garam masala powder and salt.
Stir for half a minute. add tomato puree and cook till fat leaves the masala.
Add melon seeds paste dissolved in 1 cup of water. bring it to a boil.
Add ½ boiled cauliflower and cook on dum for 10 minutes.
Serve hot garnished with chopped green coriander and melon seeds.

recipeDescription: Tasty

recipeDescription: I have made this recipe on rakhi eve and ecveryone enjoyed...so sharing with you all!
preparationMethod: Bring the milk to boil and add the milk powder, while stirring continuously.
Blend using a hand blender and mix well. Keep aside.
Combine the nuts to 2 tbsp milk and mix well to make a thick paste.
Add this paste in to milk mixture and blend well.
Make 8 coins of bread with help of cookie cutter and deep fry them in ghee till they turn golden brown and crisp.
Dip these coins in milk mixture arrange in flatter and garnish with nuts.
Serve hot or cold.

recipeDescription: Golden is made differently by using poha chivda and sprouted moong. I am sure your kids would like to eat the same especially at their exam time. Why only kids youngsters and elders will also love to have the same, as this is something different but delicious too.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl and toss well.
Serve immediately and garnished with coriander.

If teekha pudina chutney is not readily available , combine 2-3 tsp green chilli paste (can add more green chilli paste if you want more teekha) and lemon juice with 1/4 cup of water and mix the same in poha chivda along with other ingredients.
If you like can add chopped onion also.

recipeDescription: Golden Coin, a nice snacks recipe enjoyed and loved by kids.
preparationMethod: Cut the bread slices in circle shape. Keep aside.
Combine all the remaining ingredients in a bowl and mix well.
Put 1 tbsp of the prepared mixture on top of one slice and cover it up with other slice
Heat a tava grease it with little oil and cook the bread from both the sides till it turns to golden brown in colour.
Serve hot with tomato sauce.

recipeDescription: This golden dosa fritter is a healthy low calorie snack.
preparationMethod: 1. grind the sprouts and other ingredients to a soft paste. garnish chopped coriander leaves and keep aside.
2. make thin fluffy 1" diameter dosas in a nonstick tava.
3. spread out the cheese on to one side of each dosa and sprinkle with pepper and spring onion slivers.
4. roll the dosa carefully without allowing the contents to spill.
5. mix maida in 1/2 cup water to get a thinner consistency. add tomato puree to this mixture.
6.dip each dosa in the maida/tomato puree dip and deep fry till golden brown.
6. serve with pudina - garlic chutney
1.mix all the ingredients except for bread.
2. apply it the mixture on the bread slice.
3. now roast them on a non-stick tawa till golden brown.
4.serve hot with mint chutney or sauce.

recipeDescription: Each time, before placing new set of sandwiches, clean-up the sandwich maker with a paper towel.
preparationMethod: Peel off the tomato.
Grate it finely.
Grate the chilies finely.
Heat vegetable oil in a non-stick frying pan.
Add grated chilies.
After 45 seconds, add grated tomato.
Fry for 2/3minutes.
Break the eggs.
Add to the tomato.
Add salt.
Make a good mixture of the eggs and tomato by stirring them constantly with spatula.
Remove from the oven.
Cut each slice of bread to get 2 triangular pieces.
Apply some vegetable oil on both side(up and down) of the sandwitch maker.
Set it to get hot.
Melt the cheese in microwave, heating it for 10 seconds or less.
Meanwhile, spread butter on one side of each triangular piece of bread.
Put some egg-mixture on a piece of bread.
Pour some cheese over it.
Set another piece of bread
On this make sure to put the butter-spread side on the mixture.
Place the raw sandwitches carefully, inside the sandwitch-maker.
Fry until the machine shows that they are ready to be taken out.
After taking out the first set of sandwitches, apply some oil or butter on the upper side of bread pieces along with applying it inside.
Serve with tomato chutney, or tomato sauce.

recipeDescription: Gooseberry Pickle, this delicious tangy-sour pickle made with vitamin C rich gooseberries (amla) is spiked with methi seeds and chilli powder. Sesame oil enhances the flavour of the pickle. Gooseberies are available in abundance in winter. Various other pickles you can make from gooseberries and preserve are Amla Murabba, Spicy Amla Pickle etc.
preparationMethod: Wash the gooseberries and pat dry them.
In a wide pan, boil water and add in the gooseberries.
Add salt and turmeric powder to this and boil for some time (10 mins) till the gooseberries become soft, but take care not to over cook, check with a fork to see whether it is soft or not.
Drain the water completely and take out the seeds from the gooseberries.
Dry roast the mustard seeds and methi seeds. When cool grind this into a powder and keep it aside.
In a pan add sesame oil and add the 1/2 tsp of mustard seeds and asafoetida.
When it splutters add the ground mustard seeds and methi seed powder.
Add the red chilli powder ,turmeric powder and salt. Saute in a low flame for few minutes and add in the cooked gooseberries.
Mix them nicely for and let it be in the pan for a 5 minutes in a medium low flame.
Switch off the flame and allow it to completely cool.
Transfer this to an airtight container.

recipeDescription: This dish will only taste good if served hot. pasta can be boiled before and then u could use it.
preparationMethod: Cook the noodles in large pan .add a little salt to the water
Simmer garlic,cream,water,and red pepper for 15 to 20 min or until garlic is cooked.mash the garlic in the mixture by pressing it with spoons
In a big pan heat the oil add brocolli flowers saute for 3 min add 1/4 cup of water cook until water dries out completelyand then add salt and blackpepper
As soon the pasta are done drain it and addto brocolli mixture.stir in the garlic mixture.
Garnish it with both kind of cheese.

preparationMethod: 1.in a double boiler melt the dairy milk bar.
2.wash and wipe grapes.
3.cover the grapes with melted chocklate and place on a plate.
4.keep the grapes in the freezer for 25 minutes.later in the freeze.
1.remove the seeds of the red grapes.
2.slit green chillies, remove the seeds and finely chop them.
3. baste the grapes with a bit of oil and let them cook on the griddle for a few minutes. remove and keep aside.
4. crush them in a blender with pomegranate seeds.
5. add this to the cream and mix. add chopped green chillies, salt and pepper powder and mix.
6. add chopped coriander leaves and mix well.
7. serve the chilled dip with chips of your choice.

recipeName: Grated Yummy Boiled Egg Sandwich with Chilli Sauce and Mayo
tag: Indian Tiffin Box, Lunch box, Dabba
recipeDescription: Grated Boiled Egg Sandwich is a protein rich recipe for kids lunch box and even for elders. Quick and simple recipe. that gets ready in just few minutes. Loved by children of all ages.
preparationMethod: Remove the crust from all the bread slices and discard them.
Place the 4 bread slices on a clean dry surface.Grate one boiled egg on each slice and sprinkle salt and pepper to your taste.
Spread the red chili sauce on the remaining 4 bread slices and place over the bread slices with eggs, with the chilli sauce side facing downwards.
Yummy Grated Boiled Egg Sandwich is ready to serve or filled in lunch box.
Garnish the sandwiches with mayonnaise and tomato ketchup.
You can also put grated cheese above the sandwich if your kids like that.

recipeDescription: Green beans salad recipe is a good way of having healthful greens and protein rich sprouted beans on your dinner table. A tasty crunchy salad recipe, beans are tossed with tomato and ginger dressings, a creative recipe with health benefits.
preparationMethod: Fry the beans with very little oil until tender or microwave the beans first & then fry.
Remove from heat and add onions, green chilies, salt, grated coconut & lemon juice.
Serve immediately or chilled

recipeDescription: A simple to make tikka recipe which can also be served in any indian parties. . A perfect cocktail snack!
preparationMethod: Put the oil,onions and garlic in a microwave safe bowl and cover and microwave on high for 2 minutes. Keep aside.
Combine the besan with 2 1. 2 cups water and whisk well.
Add this to the onions and microwave at 80% for 4 minutes, stirring once in between.
Add the remaining ingredients and microwave on high for 4 minutes, stirring once in between.
Remove mixture onto a tray and spread into a ½” thick rectangle.
Cool completely and cut into square pieces.
Heat the oil in a pan and add the besan tikkas and fry till they turn golden brown.
Serve with coconut chutney.

Remove this in a pan add to this all the ingredients except for the pavs(bread>,
Tomato and oil.
Mix well .

Batter made in the bowl.

Of oil add place the dipped

Of tomato cook the pav on
Both sides till crisp

recipeDescription: Serve with plain parathas or any thing in lunch or dinner.

recipeDescription: An ideal dip for momos, garlic breads, and starters.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a deep pan, add onions and garlic and saute till they turn pink in colour.Remove from the flame and allow it to cool.
Combine all the ingredients in a mixer and blend till smooth thick paste.Add 1/4 cup of water if required.
Blend till only a few small pieces of garlic are undone. This shall add a crunchy twist to the dish.
Serve with snacks of your choice.

recipeDescription: Green Grape Salsa, a unique ingredient use to make salsa but it taste good.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl and mix well.
Serve with bread, nacho chips or with crackers.

recipeDescription: It is a refreshing drink made from green kiwifruit and cranberry juice.
preparationMethod: Combine the scooped kiwi fruit and ginger and blend in a mixer till it becomes pueed, making sure that the kiwifruit seeds are not broken.
Add the cranberry juice and blend again till smooth.
Place the ice in serving glasses and pour the liquid.
Serve immediately garnished with mint leaves.
Soak moong in water for overnight.
Grind green moong , chilies,garlice,to a smooth paste along with salt with a little water.
Heat tava, make thin dosas.
Serve hot with chutney.

recipeDescription: Presenting an unique and tempting Green peppers with besan recipe. The green peppers or capsicums are cooked with chopped onions, spice powders and sprinkled with gram flour or besan to create this tasty vegetable dish. Relish with roti.
preparationMethod: Take oil in frying pan
Add mustard seeds
Then put onions(finely shopped)
Fry them till golden brown
Add salt and chill powder(as per taste)
Now put capsicum's
Cook them well and then sprinkle besan on it,
Close the lid and let it cook for 10 mins
Serve hot
Garnish it with corriander

recipeDescription: Green sparkle,as the name suggests this drink is of green colour made from khus syrup with the combination of green grapes juice and to give sparkling effect I have added lemon soda in it.It is so cool and thanda thanda since I have also added falooda seeds(Sabja) also and to make it more attractive I have used crushed ice cubes of khus syrup as well as of falooda seeds instead of plain water ice cubes
preparationMethod: Dissolve khus syrup in 2 cups of water and pour in ice tray and keep in deep freezer to set.
Add soaked falooda seeds in 3 cups of water, mix well.
Pour in ice tray and keep in deep freezere to set.
In serving glass add 2-3 ice cubes of khus syrup, 2-3 ice cubes of falooda seeds, pour 1 tbsp soaked falooda seeds.
Add 1 tbsp of khus syrup, pour 1 cup of green grape juice on it.
Pour ½ cup lemon soda on top.
Similarly prepare other drinks.
Serve with stirrer.

recipeDescription: Greensomph sandwich is quite an unique sandwich recipe. The coconut, coriander leaves, green fennel seeds(somph or saunf), turmeric and chillies are blended together in a fine paste and then applied on the bread slices .
preparationMethod: Grind all the ingredints.
Apply the paste to the bread and and bake it in the sandwich toaster.
If you are cooking in the fry pan use little oil to make the sandwich.

ingredients: salt freshly ground black pepper powder
recipeDescription: This sandwich is healthy to eat and a also a famous party snack. Serve with tangy green chutney.
preparationMethod: Butter the bread slices on side and keep aside.
Combine the paneer, tomato, coriander, salt and black pepper in a bowl and mix well.
Fill this mixture between two bread slices on the unbuttered side.
Toast it in sandwich toaster.
Serve with tomato ketchup or pudina chutney.

recipeDescription: The hakka noodles is a popular Chinese noodle preparation with a delectable combination of Chinese noodles with sauces. The vegetables and noodles are cooked together in a hot, sweet and sour sauce which is sure to tantalize your taste buds. A healthy accompaniment , salad or main course recipe, hakka noodle is best paired with chilli vegetable or Manchurian!
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a wok or frying pan on a high flame. add the garlic and red chillies and stir fry over a high flame for a few seconds.
Add the cabbage, capsicum, spring onions and ajinomoto and cook on a high flame for 2 minutes.
Add the noodles, chilli oil and salt, mix well and cook for 1 minute.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: U can use any vegetable as per choice.
preparationMethod: Add all the above ingredient in the dhokla batter. then take 1 tea spoon of oil in thick kadai add 1 tea spoon of rai and jeera in it .when it crackles add 1 big table spoon of batter in it and spread evenly thin.cover the vessle and cook both side on medium flame till 2 to 3 minutes.
Serve with sause or green chutny.

recipeDescription: A delicious breakfast recipe made of eggs mixed with mint, corriander and cheese. Serve with bread or toast.
preparationMethod: Mix all the ingredients except butter and cheese.
Add butter in a pan and pour the batter in a pan again mixing it to form a fluffy omlette.
Cook on one side till done then turn it and cook the other side.
Garnish with grated cheese and cover the lid for a minute.
Serve hot with the bread of your choice.

recipeDescription: This dish is vegan but non vegetarians can add egg to their pancake batter
preparationMethod: Boil and puree spinach
Heat oil in a pan
Spread maida batter and make puree size pancakes cook on both sides
Fry mushrooms on remaining oil for a minute
Pour tomato sauce on a oven proof dish
Place pancakes and spread spinach puree and add seasoning
Sprinkle mushrooms and add grated cheese
Add seasoning
Fold the pancake
Bake on convection grill at 200 c for 10 minutes till cheese melts

recipeDescription: Tasty and innovative dish.can be made one day before and reserve in freeze.
preparationMethod: Make puree of grated kairi by grinding it in mixie.mix it with gram flour, soya flour,1tbsp oil , roasted cumin seeds ,salt to taste, asafoetida and red chilli powder. add a few drops of water and knead to hard dough. divide the dough into 8 equal portions. grease your palms and shape out each portion of the dough with the help of your palm into ½”

recipeDescription: It is healthy and tasty in hurry

recipeDescription: This dosa is very healthy and feeling.childrn sometimes hate to eat daal chawal but they will eat this dosa as is is tasty as well

recipeDescription: Maintain a healthy and glowing hair with this Healthy hair recipe tip. The combination used for this healthy hair tonic is best suited to clear your scalp off dandruff and impart that bounce and glow which you always craved for.

recipeDescription: 1. you can choose to grind them seperately and then mix all powders or mix all ingredients and grind together. later method saves time. 2. it's healthy and tasty and lasts for months. it can also be used as a post-natal mukhwaas.

Step2 - mix raisins with above mixture.

recipeDescription: When baking some dish with cheese and you want to make it more crispy add little bread crumbs to the grated cheese and then spread in on the dish and bake,the colour and the taste of the chesse will be much tasty

recipeDescription: You may add shredded tofu/ paneer instead of the stir fried veggies. you may also add a few basil or mint leaves to the veggies for a different flavour. you may add a pinch of italian seasoning and chilli flakes to the mixture. you can make the flakes at home by pounding a few dry red chillies or using a dry mixer. serve with mustard sauce.
preparationMethod: Preheat oven.

Put sauce, beansprouts and stir fried veggies, cheese and olives, in that order, on top of pizza. place the pizza on a baking tray and bake till the cheese melts and browns slightly and take care that the lower part of the pizza does not burn.

recipeDescription: It ok if u don't use taco shell
preparationMethod: Take pita bread
Spread black beans crushed and added salt and red chilli in it.
Spread ranch dressing on it

Put some onion and tomatoes on it

Crush some hard taco shell in hand and spread equally crushed stuff on pita bread.
Relish tasty tostada pizza yummyyyyyyyyyyyy

recipeDescription: The perfect home remedy for relief from heart burn, acidity or indigestion. It also helps in digestion and is quite easy to prepare.
preparationMethod: Boil th water in a pan.
Add thymoil seeds in the boiling water.
The add the salt and lemon in the water.
Stir it nicely so that the ingeridients gets mixed up .
Keep it for some time and drink whenever necessary.

recipeDescription: Cheese dip made from cottage cheese with combination of low fat salad dressing which goes well with vegetable sticks and crackers.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients in a blender, and blend till the mixture becomes smooth and creamy.
Serve chilled with fresh vegetable sticks or assorted crackers.

recipeDescription: A lovely combination of bread, butter, chilies and fresh coriander leaves in the Herb sandwich makes it a healthy, simple and tasty sandwich recipe. You can relish it plain or toasted with chutney or sauce of choice.
preparationMethod: Take cheese and butter equally.
Mix in it green chilles finely cut and kothmir.
Mix it thoroughly .
Take bread and spread this mixture on it.

recipeDescription: Lemon is store house of vitamin c and useful in cold.herbs are effective in cold.
preparationMethod: Grind the mint, ginger and tulsi leaves in a blender. add water to it and boil it for 5 to 7 minutes. add tea leaves and strain into cups. add honey and lemon juice to taste .serve immediately.

recipeDescription: Good for stomach infection
preparationMethod: Add all the ingrdients to the water.
Boil till boiling point.
Cool and finish the water in a whole day.

Beat in lime juice,egg yolk and cream. cook on medium for 60-90 seconds.
Stir.
Add seasoning and mix until smooth.

recipeDescription: Sure cure for sinus try for 15days and see the effect.
preparationMethod: Mix all the ingredients and have it early morning ,first thing, empty stomach .

recipeDescription: The subtle taste of honey with the aroma of roses will surely leave you craving for some more cooling goodness.
preparationMethod: Boil 4 cups water in a small pan and add the petals .
Simmer for 8- 10 mins till the petals discolor.
Cool and strain.
Combine the honey ,rose water and cooled concoction in a shaker and shake vigorously.
Pour in tall glasses and top with rose ice cubes .
Garnish with fresh petals and serve .

recipeName: Hot and Spicy Baked Cheese Fondue
recipeDescription: A delicious spicy cheese fondue recipe. Enjoy!!
preparationMethod: Butter or oil for as required for greasing.
Combine eggs with milk, mustard powder, chilli flakes, red chilli sauce, salt and butter. Whisk well.
Grease an oven proof baking dish with butter.Place half of the bread slices in the baking dish.
Cover the slices with cheese. Place the remaining bread slices on top. Pour the egg mixture on top.
Bake at 350 degrees for 45-50 minutes or until set. Serve immediately.

recipeDescription: A hot and spicy dip made with celery, broccoli, onions and red pepper mixed with cheese and butter.
preparationMethod: Cook celery, red pepper, onion and margarine in skillet over. Medium heat, stirring constantly until tender.
Reduce heat to low.
Add cheese stir until melted.
Stir in broccoli/spinach and hot sauce. Heat thoroughly, stirring constantly.
Serve hot with veggies and crackers.
Makes about 4 cups.

ingredients: salt freshly ground black pepper powder
recipeDescription: A hot variation to the popular cold cucumber soup, the hot cucumber soup is simply irrestible. The grated cucumbers , a dash of butter and seasonings make this soup a healthy soothing choice.
preparationMethod: Heat the butter in a broad pan, add the onions and saute till they turn transparent.
Add the plain flour, vegetables stock, mix well and bring the liquid to boil.
Add the cucumber and cook till the cucumber becomes tender and are cooked, while stirring in between.
Remove from the flame, cool and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Add the salt and pepper, mix well and serve hot garnished wth cream.

recipeDescription: Yummy...
preparationMethod: In a small bowl, mix together the cream cheese, oregano, parsley, and basil.

Spread mixture in the bottom of a 9 inch pie plate, or a shallow microwave-safe dish. Sprinkle 1/2 cup of the mozzarella cheese and 1/2 cup of the Parmesan cheese on top of the cream cheese mixture. Spread the pizza sauce over all.
Sprinkle with remaining cheese, then top with green pepper and olive slices. Cover, and microwave for 5 minutes. Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Hot pot marconi is a simple and balanced meal in itself. The pasta is boiled and then thrown in the pot with cheese, chopped veggies and herbs and sauces of choices.
preparationMethod: Boil macroni in salted water until cooked.
Put oil in the pan
Saute onions until slightly brown, add green bell pepper,
Add beans with tomato sauce, ketchup, hot sauce, oregano, italian seasoning, peprika, macroni, stir nicely
Empty the pan into the baking tray and add cheese evenly,
Preheat oven to 350`d f, bake for 15 min or until cheese is melted.
Serve hot with garlic bread

Crush garlic and ajwain and tie it in a bandage string to make a a small round ball and tie it around the child's neck during sleep like a chain. helps declog blocked nose and helps in getting a sound sleep.

recipeName: How To Take Your Medicine Using The Help Of Ice
recipeDescription: To make bitter medicine palatable for all adults and babies.
preparationMethod: If your medicine tastes bitter and you have a difficult time putting it in your mouth, then here's what you do:
Suck on an ice cube for as long as you can till your mouth becomes numb.
As the cold ice chills the taste buds, you will be able to take the medicine without any difficulty.
Good for all adults and babies.
In a blender add all these ingr. and blend...then pour in a glass.add some ice cubes...

recipeDescription: A new and innovative version of toast sandwich using leftover idlis with cheese and chilli.It's tasty and healthy, both your children and elders would like and love to have the same as a snack.
preparationMethod: Slice each idli horizontally into two parts.
Grease a baking tray with oil.
Brush the idlies on both sides with oil.
Place them on the tray, cut side up.
Bake it in a preheated oven at (200 C) till the idlis turns brown.
Meanwhile melt butter in a non stick pan, add garlic and fry till golden brown.
Add green chilies and fry for few seconds.
Add flour and fry for 30 seconds.
Remove from fire, stir in the milk, mix till smooth and cook stirring till the sauce thickens.
1Remove from fire, stir in half the cheese.
Spread the prepared sauce over the idlis. and Sprinkle remaining cheese on top.
Again bake till the cheese melts.
Serve hot with mint chutney or tomato ketchup.

recipeDescription: It is a very tasty and delicious dish for guests.
preparationMethod: Cut the idlis into small pieces and keep aside.
Heat the oil in a pan and add the mustard and cumin seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the curry leaves and green chillies and saute for 2 minutes.
Add the turmeric powder and red chilli and idlis and saute for 5 minutes.
Remove from the flame and garnish with the chutneys, coriander leaves and sev.
Serve immediately.

recipeDescription: Believe me kids will love these extraodinary dish . and if u put leftover idlies in microwave for 30 seconds before making sandwiches then it will be soft. so enjoy this dish.
preparationMethod: Cut each idli in two slices
Then put sauce on each slice
Put some cabbage on each slice
Then put onion rings on one of them

Then put tomato slice on the other one then put some capsicum slices and some jalapeños on one part and put slice of cheese on other part . then put one slice on the other and press toothpick in such a manner that its end parts fits in the bottom slice and press a cherry on top of the toothpick .

recipeDescription: Idli vadas are simply amazing and melt in the mouth when served with coconut or green chutney. The chutney filled idli vadas are crunchy crispy and make for a delicious snack or breakfast item.
preparationMethod: Take the leftover idlis and cut it into half from between.

Take the chutney and fill it in between the idlis. we can make it more spicy or less according to our taste. the the besan ka atta and add a little water ,salt to taste and a little sona and make it into dropping contisency.it should not be too thinor else the idlis will not fry.

Now put the oil on fire to heat andas soon as the oil starts to smoke put the idlis dipped in the besan batter and fry till golden brown.take out and cut it into half or the shapes desired .serve hot with tomato sauce.

recipeDescription: 1. cut vegetables into long pieces. 2. capsicum should be cooked before putting in the kadai with other vegetables since it is raw.. 3. to boil the macaroni put little oil in it so that it will not stick to each other.
preparationMethod: Heat oil in a kadai,put dry onions in it, stir for 2 to 3 mins,put adrak lasun paste,stir for 1 min,put tomato pieces,stir for 1 min,put boiled vegetables,salt,tomato sauce,,dhania jeera powder,red chilli powder in it, stir for 2 to 3 mins.
Then at the end put the boiled macroni into it..

recipeDescription: My mom's own recipe !!. have the lemon pickle when ever you want to !
preparationMethod: 1.cut 3 lemons into small pieces taking out the seeds from them.
2. peel and take the juice from the other 3 lemons
3.heat a small cup of water and let it cool.
4.pressure cook the lemon pieces - donot add any water to the pieces.
5.fry rai,hing in oil and add chilli powder and salt.
6.roast the menthi seeds and add 2 tablespoons of powder to the above mixture also adding in the juice taken from the 3 lemons
7. once the lemons in the cooker have boiled add them to the above mixture and you can have the lemon pickle immly !! without drying in the heat and waiting for 5 days or so.

recipeDescription: Jackfruit cubes preserved in pungent mustard and vinegar sauce
preparationMethod: Apply oil to the knife and peel the jackfruit. Further cut it into one inch cubes.
Pressure cook the pieces till two whistles are given taking care that they remain firm and do not get mashed.
Break green chillies with hand, add salt and crush.
Heat oil in a pan and add the cumin seeds, mustard seeds, coriander ,crushed green chillies with sea salt and cook for two minutes.
Add cooked jackfruit cubes, turmeric powder and cook for five minutes.
Add lemon juice and vinegar and stir well and remove from heat.
8Put into sterilized glass and store.

recipeDescription: A delicious nachos chips served with whit sauce made with cheese,maida, milkandcapsicum.
preparationMethod: Mix all the ingredients except oil fro frying and knead and a soft dough.
Divide the dough in to 8 equal portions
Roll dough in to thin not very thin roti like and cut like chakra shape.
Fry those pcs till very light brown and crispy.
In a vessel keep milk for boiling.
After boiling, add the grated cheese and capsicum to it let it cook for 2 min.
Add salt,oregano and chilli flakes to it and mix well.
1.Arrange chips in a serving tray pour white sauce on it and garnish with oregano and chilli flakes.
Serve immediately.

recipeDescription: A delicious soup made with matki and sevred with farsan and pau/bread
preparationMethod: Wash and soak matki fro 6 hrs.
Drain Water from matki and pressure cook till 2 whistle without water.
Grind coconut,green chillies and coriander to a fine paste.
Heat oil in a thick vessel add coconut paste to it fry for 2 min till oil oozes out of it .
Add the matki and fry for 2 min and add the chilli powder, turmeric powder, salt and garam masala,tomato puree saute for 2 min.
Add 3 big cups of water to it let it come to boil.
Close with lid and on on low flame let it cook for 15 minutes.
Garnish with coriander leaves
Serve hot soup with sev and Butter.

recipeDescription: A delciious jain paneer bhurji recipe!
preparationMethod: Heat oil in a non-stick pan and add cumin seeds and ginger to the pan and sauté.
Add green chillies and capsicum and sauté.
Add turmeric powder, garam masala and coriander and mix.
Add cottage cheese and salt and mix everything well.
Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
To make tomato cups, cut off a thin slice from the top of each tomato and remove the pulp.
Cut off a thin slice from the bottom of the tomatoes so that they can stand upright.
Stuff them with the paneer bhurjee and arrange them in a glass bowl. Grill in a microwave for 4 minutes.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: A refreshing and popular summer drink,jal jeera is prepared from roasted cumin seeds powder mixed with black slat and other spices. The cool cumin seed water or jal jeera is a spiced up indian lemonade recipe which goes well as an accompaniment with any meal, especially in summers.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Add 3/4 glass chilled water and add 1 tsp of jal jeera powder and mix well.
Strain the mixture.
Garnish with salted boondi and a slice of lemon.
Serve chilled.

recipeDescription: This is a hot sandwich. use capsicum if reqd instead of jalapeno. use more butter and sauce.
preparationMethod: Take oil in a kadai, fry onions (cut previously to thin long pieces) to translucent.
Then put jalapenos cut into medium square pieces , fry for a minute.
Then put garam masala pwd,pepper pwd, salt, ginger paste,fry for a min and remove from fire.
Take a bread slice, spread butter over it ,keep a spoon of the above jalapeno mixture,
Cover it with another buttered bread slice.
Toast it on a tawa on both the sides with enough ghee and serve with tomato sauce.

recipeDescription: If you are fed up eating all the sweet cookies then try these Jeera chilly cookies to change the taste buds.Thes cookies are baked and hence healthier too.
preparationMethod: Mix all the above ingredients with the finger tips till it resembles bread crumbs like structure.
Add a tsp by tsp chilled water to bind the medium stiff dough.
Make balls of the dough and roll to a roti and prick with a fork.
Cut to desired shape with a cutter and bake in a preheated oven at 180 degree C for 20 minutes or till crisp.
Serve with tea.

recipeDescription: A simple jeera sprout recipe with sprouts stir fried with roasted jeera. Share your favorite sprout recipe online.
preparationMethod: First boil the sprout ina vessel n strain it properly.then in a frying pan take oil n add jeera.after crackling of jeera, add the sprout and stir fry in slow flame .then leave covered for some time.switch off the gas n add jeera lal mirchi powder to n serve with grated onion n corinder leaves...

recipeDescription: A delicious sweet and tangy chutney recipe!
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a kadhai, add the onions and saute till they turn golden brown.
Add the tomatoes, chillies and tamarind and saute for 5 minutes.
Cool and blend in a mixer till smooth. Keep aside.
Heat the sesame oil in a small pan and add the mustard seeds and curry leaves.
When the seeds crackle, pour this tempering to the chutney and mix well.
Store refrigerated.

recipeDescription: Haldi ie Turmeric has lot of medicinal benefits. This Pickle uses very little oil and uses the phrase 'Health bhi Taste bhi' to its fullest.
preparationMethod: Wash the haldi roots and keep it for drying.
Peel off the skin from haldi and cut it into small julienne strips.
Now in a pan dry roast the mustard seeds, fennel seeds and Fenugreek Seeds for 2-3 minutes and after roasting, coarsely grind the mixture.
Now in a bowl mix the haldi with this mixture. Add salt as per your taste. Preferably around 30 gm.
In another pan take some oil and make a tempering using mustard seeds and asafoeitda.
Add the tempering to the bowl and mix well and add the lemon juice to the mixture.
Keep this mix in a container for 2-3 days.
After 2-3 days your Haldi ka Achar is ready to eat.

recipeDescription: A famous spicy vegetable. . Which is enjoyed by everyone!
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a pan, add the garlic paste, ginger paste and onions and saute till the onions turn brown in colour.
Add the red chillies, coriander powder and salt and mix well.
Add the green chillies and tomato puree, mix well and cook on a slow flame, while stirring continously, till the oil gets separated. Keep aside.
Heat the oil in another kadhai, add the ginger paste and saute for 2 minutes.
Add the mushrooms, capsicums, salt and garam masala, mix well and cook for 3 to 4 minutes. Keep aside.
Place the cooked mushrooms on a serving plate, pour the gravy on top and sprinkle kasoori methi and garam masala.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: So tasty and delicious sweet recipe, mix khoya and nuts kaju also they are give a creamy taste. This sweet will like people very much.
Bittergourd onion recipe that will leave you wanting more and licking your fingers
preparationMethod: Peel the skin of karela and cut it into small pieces
Soak the pieces in little salt and tamarind water for atleast 5-6 hours.
Squeeze all the excess water from the karela pieces and keep aside.
Heat the oil in a pan and fry the karela pieces till light golden brown few pieces at a time and keep aside.
Roast the cumin seeds, corriander seeds, dry red chillies lightly till the aroma of the spices is released.
Grind the onions, tamarind, spices(jeera, dhaniya, redchillies, turmeric, chilli powder, salt) and garlic cloves to a paste.
Heat the oil(used for frying karela pieces) and put the paste and cook till the paste starts releasing the oil.
Now add the karela pieces and mix well.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Enjoy with drinks.
preparationMethod: Wash,frylegs in hot ghee for 15 minutes.now add garlic and ginger.after 5minutes add the black pepper.cover with lid for last 5minutes.ready to eat spicy chicken legs.

recipeDescription: Ladies fingers filled with a stffing of grate coconut mixed with various spices and condiments and fried crispy.
preparationMethod: Slit the ladies finger vertically and keep aside.
Stuff each ladies finger with the prepared stuffing mixture and keep aside.
Heat oil in a pan and add the cumin seeds.
