When the seeds crackle, add the green chillies and stffed ladies finger and saute for 5 minutes.
Mix well and cook for 10 minutes, or till the ladies finger becomes soft.
Serve hot with chapatti or any stuffed paratha’s.

ingredients: cumin seeds (jeera) pomogranate seeds (anardana) nigella seeds (kalonji)
recipeDescription: Tasty and healthy subzi made with grated karela cooked with a paste of onion, jeera and anardana.
preparationMethod: Mix chill ,onion ,paste (onion ,jeera ,anardana ,salt).
Put oil in karhai ,put jeera ,when splutter.
Add chill mixture ,roast on low fire ,till brown serve.

recipeDescription: Good for wat ,cough
preparationMethod: 1 dip fresh karonde in water
2.after 3 hours take out from water ,cut into 2 pieces ,take out seed
3.rub salt and haldi ,keep in jar, tie its mouth with thin cloth
4.add hing .chilli.lemon juice ,salt .
5.tie mouth of jar with cloth ,keep in sun for 1 week

ingredients: capsicum, sliced into thin and long strips
recipeDescription: Kasadiya is a dip made from onionS, tomato and garlic and then enjoyed as accompaniment with starters or as spread on tortillas.
preparationMethod: Make a thick gravy of onions(half finely chopped and half churned), tomatoes and garlic.
Add some vinegar to this.
Add salt and chilli powder according to taste.
On a tortilla, spread the batter and over this some thin slices of onions, capsicum and cheese.
On another tortilla spread ketchup and put it over the first one(make it like a sandwich)
On a pan cook both side with oil. serve hot

recipeDescription: Kashmiri soda is a fizzy cool summer drink. The lime juice is mixed with black salt and soda to create this lemony fizzy beverage, kashmiri soda.
preparationMethod: In a glass add lemon juice, black salt and salt and top with soda.

recipeDescription: Methi paneer imparts a delectable combination of creamy paneer or cottage cheese cubes tossed with chopped fenugreek or methi leaves. A lovely side dish, methi paneer taste superb with naans or rotis.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a pan and add cumin seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the onions and saute for 5 minutes or till the onion become transparent.
Add paneer cubes, kasuri methi, pepper and salt, mix well and cook for another 5 minutes.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: A khatti mithi chutney usually eaten with chaat like sev puri pani puri, bhel.
preparationMethod: Soak the dates and tamarind in a bowl in sufficient water for at least 4 hours.
Combine the khajur and imli and blend in a mixer to a smooth puree.
Transfer the mixture in a bowl.
Add the red chilli powder, coriander-cumin seeds powder, asafetida and salt and mix well.
Store in an air-tight container and keep refrigerated.
Use as required.

recipeDescription: Enjoy these laddoos for the up coming winter.
preparationMethod: Heat the ghee in a pan and put dates and prunes and sauteed till both becomes soft.
Remove from the flame and add dry coconut,almond,cashewnuts and raisins and mix well.
Roll it into small balls to make 10 laddoos.

recipeDescription: Children and olds love it.
preparationMethod: Slit the dates to be stuffed. set aside. mix together all the stuffing ingredients well. fill each slited date with a portion of paan mix and roll the in coconut powder and serve after dinner as mukhwaas.
Add churan to cocacola and have great fun

recipeDescription: This is a very instant recipe with a unique taste all will enjoy.
preparationMethod: Keep the oil in a kadai and when it is hot, add finely chopped green chillies.
Add finely cut onions, and fry till golden.
Add finely cut tomatoes and fry till they are cooked.
Add chaat masala, chilli sauce and tomato sauce and fry for a minute.
Add the crumbled left-over cake to this and salt to taste.
Saute for just a minute and garnish with coriander.
Eat hot with a steaming cup of tea.

tag: Chunky Jain soups, Creamy Jain soups
recipeDescription: A delicious unique soup!
preparationMethod: Boil 2 cups water in a deep pan, add the ladies finger and boil till the water reduces to 1 cup.
Remove from the flame and strain.
Add salt and pepper to the strained water and bring to boil.
Heat the ghee in a small pan and add the mint leaves and saute for 10 seconds.
Add this to the soup and mix well.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Use black salt pinch.
preparationMethod: Mix all the ingridients.
Add salt.
Add lime.
Garnish with coriander.

recipeDescription: 1. if you don't have a rolling pin u can flatten the bread slices with the help of a flat metal thali or plate. <>2.if you're bread doesn't stay in place after rolling into pinwheel then push two toothpicks at both ends of the pinwheel to make the ends stay.
preparationMethod: Take 3 pieces of garlic, 1 medium sized chilli and 2 tblspn of chopped coriander. crush to a paste. add salt to taste.
Take the slices of bread and flatten with a rolling pin. keep aside.
Take cheese spread in a bowl, and add garlic mix to it.
Add pepper. mix properly.
Now spread the cheese mix on the slices of bread evenly and roll the bread pieces into a pinwheel.
Keep in the freezer for 5-10 mins. meanwhile mix besan, water and pinch of salt.
Stir until all lumps are dissolved.
Heat oil for frying. now dip lasooni chakra''s in the besan mix and deep fry.
Drain on a tissue. then cut the pinwheels into slices and serve hot with tomato - chilli sauce or mayonnaise.

recipeDescription: Sun heat cooks it
preparationMethod: 1.with chilka cut lauki in big pieces .
2.boil pieces till cooked soft
3.mix rai , lauki ,salt ,oil ,lauki.
4.keep in glass jar ,in sun,after 5 days it will be ready

recipeDescription: Tasty and easy enjoy with puri or paratha.
preparationMethod: Heat the ghee in a kadhai, add the cumin seeds, garlic, green chillies and saute for 1 minute.
Add the bottle gourd, turmeric powder, chilli powder, mix well and saute for 2 minutes.
Add salt, mix well and cook on a medium flame for 4-5 minutes.
When the subzi is dry, saute for more 2 minutes.
Serve hot with puri or paratha.

recipeDescription: A delicious fragrant herbal cool drink!
preparationMethod: In a blender, combine the honey, milk, lavender, fennel juice, clarified butter and blend well.
Serve in a martini glass very chilled.

recipeDescription: Get ready to devour the interestingly created snack or breakfast option, Layered cheese bread. The breads are layered with cheese and then poured over with beaten eggs, chopped onions and seasonings before placing it in the oven. The baked bread delicacy is cheesy and flavourful.
preparationMethod: Trim crusts from 4 slices of the bread.
Cut trimmed slices half diagonally to make 8 triangles, set aside.
Arrange trimmings and remaining 4 slices of untrimmed bread to cover bottom of 9x9x2 inch baking pan.
Place cheese slices over bread.
Arrange the reserved 8 triangles in 2 rows over cheese.
Beat eggs, stir in milk, chopped onion, mustard, salt and black pepper powder to taste.
Pour over bread and cheese layers.
Sprinkle red chilli powder.
Cover and chill for a few hours.
Preheat oven at 325 degrees.
Bake uncovered for 1 hour or till knife inserted comes in clean.
Let stand 5 mins before serving.
Serves 6

recipeDescription: Lehsuni papad ki sabzi, papad cooked in delicate aroma of garlic gravy.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in pan and add the cumin seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the asafoetida and garlic paste and saute for a few minutes.
Add the salt, turmeric, chilli powder and coriander powder, mix well and saute for a minute.
Add the 1/4 cup water and bring it to boil.
Add the papads and cook for 2 minutes.
Serve hot garnished with coriander.

recipeDescription: Lemon achar or nimbu ka achar recipe with a tangy spicy touch.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients except the lemon and mix well.
Slit the lemon into 4 pieces, taking care not to separate them.
Stuff the prepared masala in each lemon and place them in a glass jar.
Cover and keep under the sun for 10 days.
Serve as required.

recipeDescription: A novel soup recipe, lemongrass and chili soup is a vegetable soup with a difference. The lemon grass and chili combination is unusual but in the soup tastes great. A perfect winter soup recipe.
preparationMethod: In medium saucepan, heat vegetable broth to a simmer with lemon grass stalks and dried lime leaves if desired.

In small skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. add garlic and ginger and cook, stirring often, about 30 seconds. when broth has simmered for 5 minutes, remove lemon grass and lime leaves and discard. add cooked garlic and ginger to broth. return broth to a boil and stir in chile paste and mushrooms
Cook until mushrooms have wilted, about 30 seconds, then stir in lime juice and soy sauce. remove from heat and ladle soup into small bowls.
Top each bowl with a few tomatoes, a little cilantro and a small pinch of hot green chilies if desired.
Alternatively, mix tomatoes and chilies together and place in a small serving bowl. set on the table for people to help themselves.

recipeName: Lemon Yogurt Cake with Summer Berries

recipeDescription: A refreshing and fizzy twist of the classic lemonade. Ideal on a hot summer's day and for an evening mocktail. If you wish you can use soda instead of seven up.
preparationMethod: Take 2 glasses, put half of lemonade in both the glasses.
Now put 1 lemon in both the glasses.
Now garnish with mint leaves and sliced lemon on the side of the glass.

recipeDescription: Enjoy this delicious ,crunchy and healthy lemony cabbage salad seasoned with vinegar and white pepper. A must try for all health conscious people and weight watchers.
preparationMethod: In a bowl put the paneer,capsicum and cabbage.
Pour the lemon juice and vinegar over the salt and pepper powder.
Set aside.
Toss just before serving.
Enjoy this lemony crunchy and healthy salad and forget about the inches u'll put on.

recipeDescription: A tempting mushroom recipe with lemony taste is a nice variation. Lemony mushroom is simple and quick to prepare with unique flavours.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a pan, add the mushrooms and saute on a medium flame for 2 minutes.
Remove and keep aside.
In the same pan and oil, add the onions and saute for 1 minute.
Add the tomato, ginger-garlic paste, chaat masala, green chillies, coriander, mix well and cook for 1 minute.
Cool and add the lemon juice and mix well.
Add the mushrooms and mix well and cook for more 30 seconds.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Limbu mari sev is a tangy and spicy evening snack recipe with the gram flour or besan based sev deep fried and then enjoyed with a tinge of lime juice and spice powders.
preparationMethod: Dissolve soda bicarb in one cup water.
Mix all the ingredients well and bind to a smooth dough using the soda bicarb water.
Put a handful of the dough into the sev mould and press sev directly into the hot oil in the kadai.
Fry till done and crisp on both sides. this sev is a special treat when served with pnk.

recipeDescription: These two different flavours gives good taste...
preparationMethod: Blend Kiwi crush, lychee crush and 100 ml of soda water.
Add remaining soda water to it and mix well.
Add ice cubes and serve chilled.

recipeDescription: You will definitely love this quick dish which is low in calories too. Simple dish with few ingredients is worth trying .
preparationMethod: Heat up oil in a pan and add cumin seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the asafoetida and bell peppers and salt and mix well.
Cover the pan and put water on the cover so that bell peppers will not stick to the bottom of the pan.
Allow it to cook for 5-6 mins with intermittent stirring.
When fully cooked add sambhar masala and mix well.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Usually we love chinese but what if you are on a diet to lose weight try this you will definitely not miss chinese or tasty food more over this is low in calories and low in fat.
preparationMethod: Heat oil on high flame.
Sauté onions garlic ginger for 1 minute.
Add all other ingredients mix well cook for 2 minutes.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: This drink is not just for parties. it is a healthy drink to start the day with!
preparationMethod: Blend all the ingredients in a liquidizer.strain and serve .

recipeName: Laccha Onions ( Kebabs and Tikkis Recipes)
Lachha Onion Recipe, Onion Ring Accompaniment
Lachha Paratha, How To Make Lachha Paratha
Lachha Paratha, Punjabi Soft Flaky Lachha Paratha

recipeDescription: Leftover bhaji and ladi pav pair up to make a wonderful snack, which you can have for breakfast or as a tea-time treat. The buttery taste and enticing crispness of the pav is a perfect match for the mouth-watering flavour of the bhaji. The enticing gooeyness of molten cheese adds a fun element to the Ladi Pav Bhaji Toasts, making it a great hit with people of all age groups.
preparationMethod: Cut each ladi pav into two. Apply little butter on inside of each half of the pav and place them on a greased baking tray and bake in a pre-heated oven at 200°c (400°f) for 10 minutes.
Apply 1 tbsp of bhaji on each pav and spread it evenly. Sprinkle 1 tbsp of cheese evenly over it and bake again for 5 to 7 minutes or till the cheese melts.
Serve immediately.

recipeDescription: Nadru Goolar, it is kebab made up of lotus steam and stuffed with figs.
preparationMethod: Grind the lotus stem in to smooth puree. Keep aside.
Heat the oil in a pan, add the asafoedita, and half the quantity of finely chopped ginger and green chillies. Mix well and saute for a minute on a medium flame.
Add the lotus stem puree, saffron, chilli powder, dried ginger powder, fennel powder and salt and mix well. Cook on a medium flame till the mixture becomes dry.
Add the besan, mix well and cook for 5 minutes.
Divide into equal portion and keep aside.
Soak the figs in water till they become soft and fluffy, chop the figs.
Combine the figs, remaining ginger and green chilies, salt and lemon juice in a bowl and mix thoroughly.
Divide the stuffing into equal portion and keep aside.
Take a portion of the lotus stem mixture, spread it little wide add the one portion of the stuffing, seal and roll it into round shape and flatten it little.
Heat the ghee in deep non-stick pan and shallow fry the kebabs till it turns golden brown in colour from both the sides.
Follow the same procedure for the remaining mixture and stuffing.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: A salty snack... to be enjoyed at tea-time.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients in a deep bowl and knead into a semi-stiff dough using enough warm water. Keep aside.
Divide the dough into 8 equal portions.
Roll each portion into a thick puri.
Cut each puri length wise and cut into 2" pieces.
Heat the ghee in a kadhai and deep fry the pieces till they turn light golden brown in colour from both the sides.
Serve immediately or store in an air0tight container.

recipeDescription: Fast, easy to cook, munching snacks.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl, mix well and knead into a smooth dough.
Make medium sized balls and roll in to flat thin circles.
Using a knife, cut ½ inch pattis.
Heat the oil and deep fry the pattis till they turn golden brown and crisp.
Serve hot or cool and store in an air-tight container.

recipeDescription: Easy to make
preparationMethod: Mix all the ingredients and dry in sun till completely dry.

recipeDescription: Namkeen burfi presents quite an interesting savory snack recipe prepared by cooling together gram flour or besan with salt, red chilli and then made into barfis.
preparationMethod: Heat a pan and roast besan till golden brown.
Add 1 cup of water and the remaining ingredients, mix well and transfer in a microwave safe bowl.
Microwave on high for 4 to 5 minutes or till cooked or set.
Cut into desired pieces and serve.

recipeDescription: Unique,attractive ,tasty and easy to make.
preparationMethod: Mix gram flour with all the batter ingredients and add enough water to mix a thick batter of dosa batter consistency and keep aside to rest for 30 minutes. after 30 minutes

Heat oil in a flat pan. put the mixture in a cloth bag with a small hole & pour it into the hot oil in jalebi shape. when crisp remove from oil and keep on absobent paper to drain extra oil. sprinkle chat masala mixed with dried mint powder according the taste.
serve hot with green & tamarind chutney.

recipeDescription: Hi
preparationMethod: Jkhmnbmnbjhjhjhjhkjhjjbjbjhjhjhjhjhhkj

recipeDescription: This nimki is good for digestion and can be kept safely for years together.
preparationMethod: Wash lemon ,dip in water for 2 days and keep aside.
Drain, wash and wipe with a kitchen towel.
Rub the lemons slightly on the mortar and keep aside.
Spread salt evenly in glass jar and arrange the lemon on salt and cover with remaining salt.
Cover and keep under the sun for a few days or till salt melts and lemon is soft.
Serve as required.

recipeDescription: U can use cherries, any dry fruit or small cholcolate piece in place of cashenut but this taste delicious without baking
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingrediants except cashewnuts and make a dough. then make small balls. roll on coconut powder and place cashewnut on each ball. put it in a deep freezer for some time. serve chilled

recipeDescription: Its best to use sil's baked beans tin for good results.
preparationMethod: Melt butter in a pan over medium heat.
Add flour and stir for a minute.
Stir in the milk.cook stirring constantly with a wire whisk until sauce thickens.
Remove pan from heat. allow to cool and mix in the remaining ingredients with half of the cheese .
Transfer the contents of the pan to an oven proof dish.top with remaining cheese.
Bake in a moderately hot oven till it''s set and the top is golden brown.

recipeDescription: Speedy way to enjoy with friends. .
preparationMethod: Prepare maggie noodles as per instructions on pack. Keep aside.
When cool, add paneer cubes and green chillies and mix well. Keep aside.
Combine the besan, salt and water to form a smooth thick batter. Add the noodle mixture and mix well.
Heat the oil in a kadhai and shape the mixture loosely into small pakoras and deep fry till golden brown and crisp.
Serve hot with tomato ketchup.

recipeDescription: Make sure that noodles dry completely before adding tomato ketcup to it. can use a lil oil for making bolls out of the dough.
preparationMethod: Boil noodles till they are fully cooked, remove from fire and wash it with cool water.
Drain water from noodles and keep them aside to cool.
Cut cottage cheese into cubes.
Mix tomato ketchup, salt, chilli powder, hot spice, nutmeg powder and noodles together.
Add cheese cubes to the mixture and mix gently.
Make bolls of the mixture assuring that cheese cubes won’t break.
Deep fry these bolls on a slow to medium fire till they turn golden brown.
Serve hot with mint chutney or any other spicy chutney.

recipeDescription: A different and unique pizza with noodles as a topping. Garnish with Italian herbs.
preparationMethod: On the pizza bread,apply a layer of chilli sauce.
Spread a layer of boiled noodles evenly upon the sauce.
Mix the remaining sauce with the vegetables and spread upon the noodles evenly.
Top it with mozzarella cheese and coriander .
Bake in the oven for 8 minutes at 300 degrees f.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: A quick way to cook noodles in an innovative way. Cooked with an Indian tadka and loads of vegetables, turns Kids favourite noodles into a healthier option and will be devoured by young and old alike.
preparationMethod: Put water and 2-3 drops of oil in a vessel and bring it to boil.
Add the noodles and allow it to cook for 2 minutes.
Take off the heat and drain the excess water.
Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, curry leaves and asafoetida.
When the seeds crackle, add the onions and saute for 1 minutes.
Add the green chillies and remaining vegetables, mix well and add salt and cook for 5 minutes or till the vegetables are soft.
Add the cooked noodles to the vegetables, mix well.
Serve hot garnished with coriander.
Method:
Mix all the ingredients in a large bowl, except for yellow shev and coriander, finely chopped, for decoration.
Serve in plates and decorate it with yellow shev and chopped coriander.

ingredients: salt freshly ground black pepper powder
preparationMethod: Heat the butter in a pan,add the ginger and onions.
Add capsicum,saute for 2 minutes. Add 1 tsp maida and roast a little.
Add chilli powder and tomato puree. Stir fry till dry.
Add rajma, macaroni, ketchup, salt and pepper.
Transfer in a greased baking dish.
Sprinkle grated cheese on top and Bake for 10 minutes at 180 degrees or till the cheese melts.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Tasty and spicy version od the famous macaroni and cheese preparation with chillies.
preparationMethod: Boil the macaroni in enough water till 3/4 cooked.
Drain the water in a colander and keep aside.
Heat a kadai and add oil and butter on small flame.
Add tomato puree, salt, red chilli powder, black pepper powder, green chillies,and saute for some time till the tomato is cooked and the oil seperates.
Toss in the macaroni along with the spring onion.
Switch off the gas and remove pan from fire.
Add the grated cheese and mix gently till the cheese melts.
Serve immediately as a snack.

recipeDescription: Easy tasty and takes 5-7 minutes to be ready.
preparationMethod: Mince all ingredients except the oil in a food processor. do not grind to a paste. remove from processor to a bowl and mix well. roll out in the shape of cigars .refrigerate for 20 mins. deep fry in hot oil till golden brown. serve with sweet chilli sauce or any dip

recipeDescription: Italian pakoda..a desi twist to italian feast!!
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl and mix well adding 4 to 5 tbsp water to make a thick batter.
Cover and keep aside for 15 minutes.
Heat the oil in a kadhai and drop spoonful of batter and deep fry till they turn golden brown from all the sides.
Drain on an absorbent paper and serve hot with sweet chilli sauce and garlic sauce.

recipeDescription: Relish ths crispy maddur vadas crunchy hot and deep fried with coconut chutney or sauce.
preparationMethod: Heat the ghee in a kadhai, add the semolina and maid and saute for 2 minutes.
Add the onions and green chillies and saute for 4 minutes.
Combine all the ingredients along with little water and knead into a soft dough.
Divide the dough into equal portions and shape them into small round flat vadas.
Heat the oil in a kadhai and deep fry the vadas till they turn golden brown and crisp from all the sides.
Drain on an absorbent paper and serve hot.

recipeDescription: Hot and deep fried balls of sooji and maida mixed with onions, chillies and ghee.
preparationMethod: Heat the ghee in a kadhai, add the semolina and maid and saute for 2 minutes.
Add the onions and green chillies and saute for 4 minutes.
Combine all the ingredients along with little water and knead into a soft dough.
Divide the dough into equal portions and shape them into small round flat vadas.
Heat the oil in a kadhai and deep fry the vadas till they turn golden brown and crisp from all the sides.
Drain on an absorbent paper and serve hot.

recipeDescription: A delicious fusion of mini gulab jamuns, crumbled boondi laddoos and rabdi.
preparationMethod: Crumble the boondi laddoos in a bowl.
Add the almonds and cashewnuts, mix well.
Spread the boondi evenly in a microwave safe dish.
Spread the mini gulab jamuns on top of it now spread the rabdi evenly on top of the gulab jamuns.
Cook in microwave at microwave on HIGH for 5 minutes or cook till the upper portion turns to light brown in colour.
Remove the dish from the microwave and sprinkle the milk masala over it.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: An innovative pakoda or snack recipe with the all time favorite maggi noodles, maggi pakoda is simply amazing when served with ketchup or chilli sauce.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl, using little water and mix well.
Heat the oil in a kadhai, shape the batter into small pakodas and deep fry till they turn golden brown and crisp from all the sides.
Drain on an absorbent paper and serve hot with tomato kethcup.

recipeDescription: Healthy and crispy starter in minutes.
preparationMethod: Mix all the batter ingredients and make a smooth thick batter with water as required. dip the roasted lotus seeds in the batter and deep fry till golden. remove and drain on an absorbent paper. sprinkle chaat masala and serve .

recipeDescription: This is a very simple yet tasty recipe. Best part is that it hardly takes any time to prepare this dish and is loved by all....be it kids, elders or youngsters..
preparationMethod: Heat oil in a kadhai and add the cumin seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the onions and green chillies and saute till the onion turns golden brown in colour.
Add the turmeric powder and salt and mix well and remove from the flame.
Add the cream and paneer cubes and mix gently.
Serve hot garnished with coriander.

recipeDescription: The malai patta or a creamy leafy vegetable recipe is prepared from spring onions. The chopped spring onion is cooked with tomatoes and spices and then added with the fresh cream or malai to render that delicious creamy taste and a lovely texture.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a pan and put in the chopped spring onion leaves.
Saute them for about 5 minutes.
Then add chopped tomatoes and cook till soft.
Now add the red chill powder and salt.
Cover and cook till the spring onion is properly cooked.
Lastly add the malai and mix well and take off from the fire.
Serve hot with hot rotis.

recipeDescription: Don't reheat after grinding and cut large pieces of tomatoes.
preparationMethod: Heat oil in a pan
Put onions and fry till they are soft
Add tomatoes and fry till they are soft
Add salt and red chilly powderand turn the gas off
Add malai to it and grind it hot with hand grinder
Serve hot with hot toast, use it as a spread.

First of all put white chocolate in the microwave on 40% power for 2 to 3 minutes and melt it. you can use double boiler system for melting. now add essence and put them into the chocolate mould box till half
. now take dark chocolate and melt it and put it over white chocolate. [both chocolate

Should be melted at the same time.you put them in box at the same time.] now take one fork move it into one box into one direction.do the same process in all boxes. keep it in the freeze for 2o minutes and then unmould it. the dark and white chocolate colour will look like a marble design. put it on the paper and serve it.

recipeDescription: A quick, tempting and simple Marie biscuit cake which is best for birthday parties. Simply pile on Marie biscuits and top them with chocolate sauce. Relish the biscuit cake with crushed nuts or fruits as topping.
preparationMethod: Take 5 biscuits and make a pile of them ie put one on other so four such pile will be there
Now melt 2 chocolates
Spread melted chocolate on this piles
Cover all the sides of biscuits with the chocolate
After 5 min keep those biscuits in ice box
After 10 min take it out and garnish with nuts and coconut powder
Cake is ready, serve it

recipeDescription: Can serve with pudhina vengaaya chutney or tomato sauce.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl and mix well.
Divide the mixture into 8 equal portions and shape them into small round balls and flatten them using your palms.
Heat the oil in a kadhai and deep fry till they turn golden brown and crisp from all the sides.
Drain on an absorbent paper.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Masala egg bread is an interesting breakfast or packed tiffin choice, with the bread slices dipped in spicy egg mixture and then shallow fried. Enjoy the masala egg bread with ketchup or green coriander chutney.
preparationMethod: Beat the eggs thorougly and keep aside
Cut onions , tomato , green chilli and coriander and mix them together
Put salt and red chillie poweder to the mixture
Add 2 spoons beated eggs in the mixute
Dip a slice of bread in the egg mixutre and put it on the pan , cover the bread with the onion mixture and cook for 1-2 minutes reverse the side with the onion mixture and cook for another minute.
Serve hot with chili / tomato ketchup

recipeDescription: Masala macaroni is a mouthwatering pasta recipe cooked in the traditional Indian way with select spice powders or masalas. The boiled macaroni is tossed with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and garam masala and served hot. A true fusion recipe of Italian macaroni pasta enrobed in Indian flavours.
preparationMethod: Boil enough water in a deep non-stick pan, add macaroni, salt and few drops of oil. Cook till macaroni is cooked which will take approx. 8 minutes. Drain the water and keep the pasta aside.
Heat the oil in a broad non-stick pan, add the garlic and ginger and sauté on a medium flame for 1 minute.
Add the onions and sauté on a medium flame for 2 minutes.
Add the tomatoes, chilli powder, seasoning cube, mix well and cook on a medium flame for 3 minutes, while stirring occasionally.
Add the capsicum, tomato ketchup, salt and 2 tbsp of water, mix well and cook on a medium flame for 2 minutes, while stirring occasionally.
Add the boiled pasta, mix gently and cook on a medium flame for 2 minutes, while tossing occasionally.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Masala Papad is a popular starter dish amongst many families when dining at a restaurant / hotel. Go to any restaurant / hotel, masala papad is a first order placed by any group of generations. Its that tempting and delicious that from youngsters to elders prefer it. It's so easy to make too also. Papad is fried / roasted and topped with onions, tomatoes and some spices. The adding of lime juice makes a wonder to it.
preparationMethod: In a bowl take chopped onion, tomato, green chili, coriander leaves and add salt, red chili powder and mix well. Add lemon juice and keep ready aside.
Roast the papad.
Place the roasted papad in a plate.
Top it up with the onion tomato topping spreading equally all over.
Garnish with sev.
Serve immediately.
Papad can also be fried or baked. Frying will give a much more yummier taste.
Serve immediately as the water left from onion, tomato, lemon juice from the topping will make the papad soggy in few minutes.

recipeDescription: A snack finger licking dish made spicy and tongue tickling!
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients, except the bread and egg and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Add the paste to the beaten egg and mix well.
Heat the tava, dip the bread in the egg masala and toast on a tava using oil till cooked from both the sides.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: A super snack that gets ready in minutes to enjoy on a cold and rainy evening. Here ghee is preferred for taste. If you are concerned about health use oil. Enjoy the toast with a hot cup of tea or coffee.
preparationMethod: Take a bowl beat the eggs well in it.
Add all ingredients except bread and mix well.
Dip the bread in the egg mixture and toast on a tava using ghee on both sides.
Serve hot with tomato ketchup or mint chutney.
Heat oil in a wok
Add mustard seeds,green chillies n kadi patta.
When the seeds splutter add tomatoes salt and red chilly powder and saute well
Add idlis broken into pcs.
Add coriander and saute for two mins and serve hot
1. wash the mushrooms and place them in a heavy-bottomed saucepan.
2. add 1/2 litre water to it and bring it to a boil.
3. immediately lower the heat and let it simmer, uncovered, for 15 mins, or till tender.
4. heat one tblsp of oil in a small skillet and saute the onions for 7-8 mins till light pink.
5. soak the bread in cold water for 10 mins.
6. squeeze out the excess liquid from bread as well as mushrooms.
7. blend together the mushrooms, bread, onion, salt and pepper.
8. stir in the eggs and mix well.
9. refrigerate for 1 hour to firm up the mixture.
10. shape into 12 oval patties, 3-4 inches long, and roll into the breadcrumbs.
11. heat the remaining oil in a large skillet and fry the patties till golden brown.
12. serve garnished with sour cream.

recipeDescription: In a hot summer, no fruit other than Watermelon is able to satiate thirst. This Watermelon drink is not only mouthwatering but healthy as well due to use of handful fresh herbs and is easy to make...
preparationMethod: Blend Watermelon pieces to make juice.
Slightly crush all the herbs, Chaat Masala, honey, lemon juice and salt together.
Add it to juice and refrigerate the drink.
Sieve this chilled mixture just before serving to get rid of seeds and pieces of herbs. Garnish with melon balls, lemon peel spiral and mint leaves.

recipeDescription: Melon bowl is a simple recipe, with a variety of mixed fruits served in the bowl made from a watermelon after scooping out the pulp and seeds. The melon bowl is an unique dessert recipe which looks very colourful, artistic and tempting.
preparationMethod: Scoop out balls of watermelon and cantaloupes
Fill the cut and empty watermelon with these balls of various melons that were scooped out. give the remaining to the kids to eat.
You may add grapes to it or any other fruits you wish.

recipeDescription: Use as a cheese sauce for macaroni or on veggies or whatever you like.
preparationMethod: Blend all ingred. in blender till very smooth. pour in a saucepan and cook on med. heat until thick, wisking constantly.

recipeDescription: Really soothing!
preparationMethod: Boil water. pour it to a water bag or a glass bottle. lie down and place the bag/bottle on the painful parts.

recipeDescription: Enjoy the subtly spiced paneer extravaganz, paneer jalfrezi which is prepared with paneer and onion and capsicum tossed together ina rich dry fruit based paste and fresh cream. The paneer jalfrezi is a party special paneer recipe, which may be served to guests on gatherings and social functions.
preparationMethod: Heat oil in a kadhai and add cumin seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the red chilies and saute for few seconds.
Add the ginger and onions and saute for 2 minutes.
Add the red chili powder, turmeric powder and capsicum pieces and cook for a few minutes.
Add the paneer pieces and toss gently.
Add the salt, vinegar, tomato pieces, garam masala, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Serve hot,garnished with coriander.

recipeDescription: A very healthy low calorie milk preparation which contains lots of vitamin A and calcium.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a pan add mustard curry leaves haldi onions and chillies.
Saute till it becomes soft and transparent.add milk and salt when it comes to boiling consistency go on adding channa atta little by little so that you can avoid the formation of lumps.
When it boils and gets semi solid consistency add chopped corrienda and a dash of ghee to enhance the taste.

recipeDescription: Minestrone soup is a popular Italian thick soup recipe with beans,vegetables and cheese. Enjoy the mouthwatering minestrone soup to beat the winter blues.
preparationMethod: In a pan boil tomato puree, ginger, water and milk.
Add cabbage, macroni, salt and pepper.
Boil well.
Sprinklegrated cheese and serve hot.

recipeDescription: Mini pizza is a coin shaped round pizza recipe with vegetables and cheese as topping. A step to step guide for preparing pizza base at home and then topping it with a delectable combination of veggies, sauces and cheese.
preparationMethod: Slit the buns in half
Put the oil in microwave safe dish.heat at 100%power for 2 min
Drop chille,onion,garlic and continue to cook.add tomato.oregano,puree,ketchup and cook uncovered for 5 min.
Put some tomato puree on each bun.srinkle the cooked onion and tomatoes.
Cover it with grated cheese
Peheat the microwave with 100%grill.
Cook the buns till cheese gets melted
Prefer lightly roasted buns before spreading the mixture.

recipeDescription: A delicious colourful saag.
preparationMethod: Combine the spinach and mustard leaves and blend in a mixer into a fine paste along with green chillies.
Cut paneer into square cubes and keep aside.
Heat the oil in a pan, add the cumin seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the garlic and sauté for half a minute.
Add the spinach puree and stir.
Check seasoning, add water if required.
When the gravy comes to a boil, add the paneer and mix well. Stir in lemon juice.
Finally add fresh cream. Serve hot with makki roti.

recipeDescription: Mixed vegetable curry for chapati, parotta or naan.
preparationMethod: Heat oil and fry onion.
Grind jeera, green chili, ginger, garlic and fry adding to the mixture for 30seconds.
Add all the spice powders and fry for a minute.
Add the tomato puree.
Add the coconut milk and let it boil
Add the cut vegetables, salt and let it cook firm.
Add coriander leaves and boil for a min.

recipeDescription: Refreshing summer sandwich which I enjoyed this summer in moab, Utah in the arches national park
preparationMethod: Spread guacamole on one slice of bread.
Spread the jam on the other slice of bread.
Layer with green pepper and cucumber slices.
Top with sprouts and cheese.
Enjoy.

recipeDescription: Mock pizza is amini pizza recipe with vegetables and cheese as topping. A step to step guide for preparing pizza base at hoem and then topping it with a delectable combination of veggies, sauces and cheese.
preparationMethod: Mix flour with salt mustard powder and cheese

Gradually mix in milk and make soft dough on a floured board 8 mm thickness and cut small rounds with a cutter. arrange pizza rounds on a greased baking tray and bake at 200degree c till light brown in colour
Remove from the oven and put topping on each one and bake againtill cheese melts.
For topping
Heat oil and vegetables and saute over high flame.mix in salt, aji-no-moto,soya sauce. remove after two minutes.put one spoonful on each pizza.top with ketchup and cheese
Bake at 200degreec on the upper shelf till cheese melts. serve hot.

Take the bread. apply some tomato ketchup on it. spread some veggies and sprouts evenly. keep onion rings on top, sprinkle salt, pepper to taste. spread cheese on top and some oregano. grill in microwave oven or normal oven till cheese melts. serve hot with ketchup.

recipeDescription: Substitute your favourite aerated drink for ginger ale. decorate with sliced fresh fruits.
preparationMethod: Dissolve jelly in boiling water.
Add ginger ale.
Pour into an 8" square pan and freeze till firm-about 4 hours.
Use an icecream scoop and fill icecream cups or cones.
Serve immediately.

recipeDescription: Mock tail cofmilpep presents an exotic mock tail recipe with cold coffee blended with carbonated beverages like cola. Relish this drink to quench your thirst on a hot summer afternoon.
preparationMethod: Mix all the ingredients in the same proportion (1:1:1) and divide it into two medium sized glass.
U can have it as a snack or a starter or at times of feeling thirsty.

recipeDescription: You can take other toppings of your choice such as cheese or paneer etc.
preparationMethod: Spread butter evenly over each biscuit.
Sprinkle some tomatoes and onions over each biscuit.
Put some dhaniya leaves over each biscuit.
Serve immediately.
This quick snack is easy to make and very tasty indeed.

recipeDescription: Every bite of delicious Moong chaat is sure to tingle your taste buds and also fill you up with the goodness of moong sprouts. A crunchy and protein rich salad recipe, moong salad makes every meal a healthy one!
preparationMethod: mix sprouted moong beans with chopped onions, chopped capsicum, chopped tomatoes and chopped green chilies.
Refrigerate for half an hour.
Make a dressing by mixing lime juice, chaat masala and salt.
Mix dressing with sprouted moong and vegetables at the time of serving

recipeDescription: It should be served hot .
preparationMethod: First of all heat ghee and put atta in the ghee and roast it at low flame untill it turns brown (in the same way as we do for halwa)and keep it aside.

Now heat the oil and once it get heated ,put rai and curry leaves in it.then put chopped onion and green chillies.fry onions till they turn brown.then add all dry masalas and atta to this.after that pour butter milk(chach)in this mixture and stir it continiously till it gains same consistency.there should be no lumps.cook it for 5-10 mins .then spr

recipeDescription: You can add taco seasoning mix to the flour mixture for fore zing!
preparationMethod: Work cheese and flour together until crumbly.
Add butter and stir well with fork.
Mold one teaspoon of cheese dough around each olive.
Place balls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheet.
Refrigerate 1 hour or more.
Heat oven to 400 degrees. bake 15-20 minutes.
Serve hot. makes 3 dozen.

recipeDescription: Olive cheese spread brings an authentic Italian touch to your meal. Simply blend the olives with paneer and fresh cream and serve as a dip or spread
preparationMethod: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl and mix well.
Serve with crackers and /or crusty bread.

recipeDescription: Are u sufferring from severe nose block try this remedy
preparationMethod: Heat a kadai,
Put the ajwain in it
Add salt
Saute till a sweet aroma comes
Transfer it to the cloth
Tie it and use as an inhaler

recipeDescription: It's quick, not a lot of mess. it taste very good, very healthy because there is no oil or butter.
preparationMethod: Break eggs in the bowl.
Add salt and pepper.
If you like then add onions, tomatoes, green chili, and little bit of garlic powder.
Don''t want to add a lot of garlic powder, because of salt.
And wisk, then put it in microwave for about 2-3 mins.

recipeDescription: A peppery tangy soup.
preparationMethod: Heat the butter in a deep pan, add the onions and garlic ad saute till the onions turn transparent.
Add the capsicum and saute for 1 minute.
Add the tomatoes and mushrooms, mix well and saute till mushrooms are cooked.
Add the stock, mix well and boil for 5 minutes.
Add the salt and pepper and mix well.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Note: for better results, take out bhajias when they are half done and press them between your palms (remember these will be hot) and again deep fry until golden brown and crisp.
preparationMethod: Apply salt to the sliced onions and keep aside for 10 minutes.
Mix all the remaining ingredients with the gram flour and add water to make a thick batter.
Squeeze out excess water from the sliced onions and mix with the batter.
Heat oil in a kadhai. Drop the batter with a spoon or with hand into moderate hot oil. Deep fry until cooked and golden brown in color.
Remove from oil and keep on an absorbent paper or towel to remove excess oil.
Serve hot with mint chutney.

recipeDescription: Tingle your senses with the delicious Onion buttered broccoli vegetable dish and enjoy with any breads of choice as side dish. The rich butter flavour enrobes the broccoli which has been stir fried with onions and select seasonings. Use the same recipe to prepare almond butter broccoli by replacing the onions with the almonds.
preparationMethod: Remove and discard outer leaves and cut off the ends of stalks from the broccoli. soak broccoli 20-30 minutes in salted water. split heavy stalks lengthwise, about 1/2 inch. cook broccoli in sauce pan until tender and drain.
In a small skillet, heat butter and onion and mix in pepper. pour onion mixture over broccoli. serve immediately.

recipeDescription: Every indian household swears by its own traditional onion chutney recipe. A spicy and tangy onion chutney is prepared from raw onions, garlic and coriander leaves. Serve with pakodas or tikkas.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a pan, add the onions, green chillies and garlic and saute till onions turn golden brown.
Add the tomatoes and saute till they turn soft.
Cool and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Use as required.

recipeDescription: Monsoon means evening party with snacks. Whenever my guests arrives in the evening ,we discuss different topics like sports,movies,foods etc.By this time I use to make some easily making snacks items one of this is "ONION EAR RINGS" which is very easy and delicious.
preparationMethod: Sift flour with baking powder in a large mixing bowl. Add chopped coriander and green chillies,mix well.
Whisk in wine to make a thick batter. Add salt and pepper, mix well.
Heat oil in a kadhai over medium heat. Test the heat by dropping a little batter in the oil, if it sizzles and rises to the surface, then good to go.
Cut onions rings in the batter and carefully slide them into the hot oil.
Fry till onion rings are golden and crisp. Remove and drain on absorbent paper.
Serve hot with a tangy spicy dip or sauce.

recipeDescription: Use nariyal chutney and serve hot, easy to make and easy to pack for tiffins of children.
preparationMethod: Take the dosa batter.
Chop the onions finely and also chop the coriander leaves.
Put the chopped things along with all the ingredients except for the oil in the batter.
Mix the batter properly.
Now take one tablespoon of the batter and spread it on the tava.
Spread little oil also and cook it like dosa.
Now ur dosa is ready toserve with any chutney--nariyal.

recipeDescription: A popular fast food dish across countries, onion rings can now be prepared at home with this onion ring recipe. Devour the crispy deep fried onion rings as side dish or garnishing.
preparationMethod: Mix self-raisinf flour,salt and enough water to make a thick batter the constituency like a cake mix.
Cut onions into rounds and separate each rings.
Dip each rings in the batter and deep fry.
Sprinkle chat masala on the rings and serve hot

recipeDescription: A quick and easy recipe , onion rings are typically enjoyed as garnish for biryanis or simply as a snack. These deep fried crispy fried onion rings are sure to add flavour and crunchiness to any dish.
preparationMethod: Peel onions, slice thinly, and separate into rings.
In a bowl pour the milk and add the rings in it.
Keep aside for at least one hour.
Drain. do not throw the milk.
Beat the egg well, add the milk, salt and sifted flour.
Dip each onion ring into batter, drop into deep hot oil, and fry till golden brown on medium flame.
Serve hot with ketchup or any other sauce of your choice.

recipeDescription: Onion salat or salad is the best way of beating the sunstroke and arming yourself with potent heart friendly nutrients.
preparationMethod: Mix all of the ingredients together.
Let it stand for 1/2 hour before serving.
It is a great accompaniment with indian barbecue dishes.

recipeDescription: Eat tasty and be tasty
preparationMethod: Mix all the ingreidents prooperly except bread
Put this mixture on each
Slice of bread and properly spread it on the slices
Put some oil on pan and fry each slices one by one
Onion tomato sandwich is ready
Serve hot with green chutney or sauce

recipeDescription: A simple toast recipe, Onion tomato toast is made by filling up the slices of bread with onion and tomato slices. A toasted sandwich recipe, onion tomato toast can also be enjoyed plain as cold sandwich with ketchup.
preparationMethod: Mix all the ing and place it on top of the bread.
Pour 1,2t.sp oil in a pan.firstly brown bread from plain side and roast it from other side.serve hot

ingredients: thin white bread slices brown bread slices
recipeDescription: Can be made 2-3 hours in advance. can be served for cocktail parties, children's parties and they look lovely for high tea presentation. for weight conscious persons use low fat cheese spread. can also garnish with red-yellow-green peppers or a piece of celery cut into diamond shape.
preparationMethod: Cut the cucumber in 1/4 inch slices. stamp out 20 hearts (small size).
Spread cream cheese on bread. stamp out hearts (big size).
Dip the egdes in parsley - should surround the entire edge.
Top with cucumber heart.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Add a drop of mint chutney if you like.
Serve chilled or at room temperature

ingredients: salt freshly ground black pepper powder
recipeDescription: Prepare the open paneer sandwich and serve as breakfasts or packed lunch option for children. The mildly spiced up crumbled paneer topping over the bread slice improves the taste and health quotient of this sandwich recipe. Enjoy plain or toasted with ketchup.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in the kadhai, add the onions and saute till they turn pink in colour.
Add the tomatoes cook for 5 minutes.
Add the green chillies, salt, pepper, garma masala and paneer, mix well and saute fr 2 minutes.
Apply on toast and serve immediately.

recipeDescription: Open pasta sandwich is an innovative sandwich recipe with pasta and creamy sauce added as topping on a slice of bread and enjoyed as breakfast or snack item.
preparationMethod: Heat the butter & fry onions till transparent.
Add garlic paste.saute for few seconds.
Add spaghetti or noddles and mix well.
Add grated cheese leaving some for topping.
Add green chilli,tomato ketchup,salt and pepper.
Butter the toasted slices of bread spread noodles mixture on it.
Grate some cheese finely over it cut & serve.

recipeDescription: The quick brinjal curry is a vegetable recipe quite common in the households of Southern India. The cut brinjal pieces are cooked with chopped onion along with coconut, tamarind and spices. A delicious combination of brinjals or eggplants in a spicy tangy gravy.
preparationMethod: Put oil in pan, add mustard seeds and allow it to sputter.
Add brinjal pieces and fry well
To the above add garlic and fry
Then add turmeric powder, red chilli powder and salt and mix well.
Fry it occasionally in low flame by covering with a lid.
When it is cooked, add curry leaves and cilantro and mix once.

recipeDescription: Mushrooms and capsicum is a novel combination and accompanied with specific masalas are sure to work wonders to our taste buds. Mushroom and capsicum fry is a tasty and colorful dish which can be served with roti or paratha.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a pan, add the onions, green chillies and ginger and saute on a medium flame for 2 minutes.
Add the capiscum, mushroom, chilli powder and salt and saute for 2 to 4 minutes.
Add the tomato sauce and sprinkle little water and simmer for 2 minutes on a medium flame.
Serve hot.

tag: Chunky Jain soups, Creamy Jain soups
recipeDescription: Cauliflower soup is a novel soup recipe with cauliflower florets. A creamy, delicious cauliflower soup which is sure to tickle your taste buds. The vitamin a in celery is an antioxidant which helps to keep the lining of the arteries in good health. Being extremely low in fat and free from cholesterol, this delectable cauliflower soup is a perfect appetizer for those "heart conscious" people.
preparationMethod: Boil enough water in a deep pan and add the cauliflower and salt, mix well and cook till the florets are cooked.
Cool and blend in a mixer to a smooth paste.
Add the milk and pepper, mix well and bring the mixture to boil.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Easy and fast and children like this because of chess and not to spicy.
preparationMethod: Soaked bread in little bit of water.
Make small pieces and mixed all the ingredient and make small ball.
Deep fry untill golden brown and serve with ketchup or chutney.

recipeDescription: Children love this snack. and if you like chat masala, sprinkle on balls before serving
preparationMethod: 1. grate the cheese.
2. crumble the bread slices.
3. mix all ingredients and divide the mixture into equal portion .
4. shape each portion into round ball.
5. deep fry the balls untill they are golden brown in color.
6. serve hot with green chutney.

recipeDescription: 1)you can add a few drops of vanilla essence for better taste. 2)you can use dark or normal chocolate according to your liking 3)you can exclude almonds or cherries if you unlike them.
preparationMethod: Grate the chochlate
Melt the chochlate
Now add a bit of fresh cream to the melted chochlate
Now beat the mixture using a beater
Slowly add the remaining fresh cream and again beat the mixture till light and fluffy
Arrange in serving bowls and allow it to set in the refrigerator for 2 or 3 hours
Garnish using almonds and cherries
Your chochlate mousse is ready to serve

ingredients: slices of white or brown bread
recipeDescription: A tasty and hot sandwich with lots of spicy garlic on bread.
preparationMethod: Take 2 slices of bread.
Place a slice of cheese between the two.
Now add finely chopped garlic pieces and spread on the bread.
Now add salt and pepper and any other seasoning of your choice.
Now close the sandwich and roast for 2 minutes on both sides on a tawa with a little oil till both sides become golden brown.

recipeDescription: Quick gravy is a quick recipe to prepare the traditional favorite Indian spicy gravy. Mouthwatering, easy to prepare and a perfect dish when running short of time!
preparationMethod: Finely chop onion, tomatoe,capsicum n green chilly.
Fry onion till golden brown and add tomato,g.chilly and capsicum.mix well.
Now add tomato sauce and chilly powder.mix well.
Now add little water to get a gravy form.garnish with coriander leaves

recipeDescription: A cool and refreshing pudina or mint flavoured summer drink recipe, lemon pudina pani has mint leaves blended with lime juice and honey.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients along with 2 cups water and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Transfer in a bowl and refrigerate for an hour.
Serve chilled.

recipeDescription: Quick noodles is a quick recipe to dish out stir fried noodles and vegetables enrobed in delectable sauces as meal or snack.
preparationMethod: Fry the onion's till golden brown.
Add the tomato &salt with green chillies,leave it to a little heat.
Keep the noodles in the calm water or boil for 1 min.do not over cook.
Add the noodles in the fry pan&cook for 1-2 min.
Serve hot with onion ,tomato, coriander garnish(can add boiled egg cut into rings also)

ingredients: salt freshly ground black pepper powder
recipeDescription: This is quick make as starters or even a healthy snacks for children.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients, except the bread slices in a bowl and mix well.
Place the bread slices on a clean and dry surface and spread the mixture evenly on 4 slices of bread.
Cover them with remaining 4 slices and bake in a pre-heated oven till crisp.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: These bites are quick to make and a sure hit for parties or starters with drinks
preparationMethod: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl without mashing the paneer cubes
Preheat oven at 200 degrees celcius.
Brush the bread slices with butter on both the sides.
Spread the mixture evenly over the bread slices on one side and bake in oven on 200 degrees celcius for 15 mins.
Cut into squares and serve with a sauce/chutney of your choice.
You can also alternatively deep fry the bread slices

recipeName: Quick Paneer Snack In Chinese Style
recipeDescription: For those diet conscious, tofu can be substituted for paneer.
preparationMethod: Deep fry the paneer in hot oil till golden brown and keep aside.
Heat 2 tbsp oil in another pan, add the garlic, onions and green chillies and saute on high flame for 2 minutes.
Add the sliced capsicums and saute for 5 min.
Add the spring onion and saute for another 5 min.
Add the soya sauce, chilli sauce, ajinomoto, salt and mix well and saute for 2 minutes.
Add the fried paneer and toss well.
Serve immediately.

recipeDescription: Quick paneer veggie is a quick recipe to prepare the favorite mix vegetable with paneer. Mouthwatering, easy to prepare quick paneer veggie is a perfect dish when running short of time!
preparationMethod: Combine all ingredients, except the oil, kasturi methi and paneer, and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Heat the oil in a pressure cooker, add the puree and saute for 2 minutes.
Cover and pressure cook for 3 minutes or 1 whistle.
Cool, add the paneer and kasturi methi, mix well and cook for another 2-3 mins.
Serve hot garnished with corinader and fresh cream.

recipeDescription: Quick pizza is a simple and quick recipe to recreate the magical Italian delight, pizza at home. The pizza base is topped with sauces and topping of choice and sprinkled with a generous dose of grated cheese.
preparationMethod: Sieve the flour three times. add salt and yeast into it.
Mix very well and knead a soft dough using warm water.
Cover the flour with wet cloth and keep it aside for 8-10 hours.
After 10 hours take the four out of the cloth and knead it very well. divide it into 4 equal pieces.
Take one piece and make a small round thin crust of it. take another piece and make same size thin crust of it.
Take the first crust and spread some finely chopped onion on it. take the second crust and put that over the first crust.
Press the top crust on the bottom crust with hand.
And try to make little big crust of that. (make sure the sides are little bit thick then center.)
Spread the half pizza sauce equally into the center of the crust. spread half cheese on that. spread some green pepper and onion on top of that.
Put that in a pizza pan and bake in a preheat oven (325 deg) for 25 minutes or until the crust is brownish pink.
Take it out of the oven and then cut it into desired size and serve hot with soda.

recipeDescription: Add health and taste on your breakfast table with the easy to prepare quick porridge recipe. The leftover boondi or gram flour laddoos are crushed and added to milk along with nuts and served as a porridge.
preparationMethod: Boil milk for 5 minutes.
Pour the milk into a serving bowl
Add the almonds and cashunuts , cardmum powder .
Break the ladoos into small pieces and mix it with the milk.
Instant porridge is ready to eat

tag: Indian Tiffin Box, Lunch box, Dabba
recipeDescription: It is a very quick, simple and easy dish. It gives a spicy flavour to your mouth. It is a very simple yet very tasty recipe.
preparationMethod: Heat a kadhai, add oil.
Add cumin seeds, let it splutter then add onions of spring onions with green chillies. Let it cook for 2 minutes.
Now add ginger garlic paste, let it cook for 2 minutes.
Now add tomatoes, turmeric powder, spring onions, salt and water.
Now close it with a lid and let it cook for 15 minutes on medium flame.
Serve hot with chappatis or puris.

recipeDescription: Quick arvi dokla is a steamed arvi paan(colocasia leaves) recipe. The gram flour or besan is mixed with ginger garlic and chilli paste and applied on the arvi leaves before steaming. The quick arvi dokla is a quick arvi or arbi recipe which is rich in traditional flavors and taste.
preparationMethod: Apply limbu ki ras on the chopped leaves
And mix besan ,chillipd,turmeric,salt,ginger garlic paste into the leaves.

Stirr wellad salt and just before steaming add enosalt and steam like we do with doklafor 15mts .when ready cool,cut into pcs and saute with mustard and oil and garnish with cori leaves and chopped green chilly

recipeDescription: Add the salt in the end, it goes well with cocktails and a healthy snack. ground nuts good for the heart rich in protine and niacin.
preparationMethod: Mix all thease in a bowl taste, and serve immediatly or else it gets soggy .
Scrape the outer skin of raddish. now scrape the raddish and add to the raitha along with salt. mix well. season with mustard, khari leaves, asofoetida and add to the raitha

recipeDescription: It is nutrient rich. u can use fruits like strawberrya also
preparationMethod: Blend all together and pour in 2 tall glasses
And sevre

recipeDescription: This drink made for kids, is a fruity-good drink which is combination of Raspberry juice blended with raspberry sherbet and water.
preparationMethod: In a blender, combine raspberry juice, raspberry sherbet, ice cubes and water and blend until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve.

recipeDescription: 1.you can also use powdered pepper instead of green chillies to get a different taste with the same batter. 2.best when served hot.
preparationMethod: Mix the rava and maida to make a batter and add salt, green chillies and jeera to it and leave it for about 5 minutes.
Heat 1 tsp of oil,add mustard seeds and curry leaves to it.when it splatters add it to the batter.
Heat the tava and make a dosa as usual.
Serve it hot with coconut chutney or coriander chutney.

recipeDescription: This recipe gives wonderful taste and good flavour and nutritious for lactating women.
preparationMethod: Preheat oven to 350 c .
Combine beans, tomatoes, basil,salt and pepper , garlic.
Arrange bread on baking sheet .
Bake for 4-5 minutes until light brown and crisp.
Remove the bread from the oven.
Rub both the sides with garlic .
Spread bean mixture over the bread baguette slices .
Top with the cheese and bake for another 4-5 minutes until brown.

recipeDescription: Add a spicy touch to any meal with this flavorsome Red garlic chutney. The spicy garlic flavoured chutney is best added as a dip with grilled or fried starters.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a saucepan and saute the garlic and red chillies for 1/2 minute.
Add the coconut and stir for 1 more minute.
Cool and grind to a coarse paste with the tamarind and salt using a little water.
Refrigerate till ready to serve.

ingredients: salt freshly ground black pepper powder
recipeDescription: A superb delicate combination of tomatoes and celery...
preparationMethod: Combine the tomato juice, celery juice, salt, pepper, ice, Tabasco and Worcestershire sauce in a cocktail shaker.
Shake well, strain and pour into glass.
Garnish with tomato slices and serve.

recipeName: Remedy for Menstrual Cramps By shivani_arora
recipeDescription: Believe me this is an instant relief from menstrual cramps.
preparationMethod: Take turmeric with a glass of water.

recipeDescription: Take vitamin c to boost your immune system, it will help you to combat infection. increase zinc intake, it reduces ear infection. eat a healthy diet with lots of calcium in it. avoid processed foods and hydrogenated oils. stress on breast feeding for infection in infants.
preparationMethod: Put few drops of garlic juice into the infected ear. use blow dryer from about 12 to 15 inches from your head, this will remove any water trapped in the eustachian tube.

recipeDescription: Its papular and so tasty dish. Enjoy with puri and paratha. A special baingan bharta for all your family.
preparationMethod: Wash and roast the brinjal on an open flame till they turn soft and tender from inside.
Cool and peel the skin and mash them well and keep aside.
Mash the tomatoes as well and keep aside.
Heat the oil in a pan and add the cumin seeds.
when the seeds crackle, add the asafoetida and saute for 10 seconds.
Add the ginger, garlic and green chillies and saute for a minute.
Add the onions and saute till they turn golden brown.
Add the chilli powder, turmeric powder and tomatoes and mix well.
Add the salt and cook till tomatoes leaves oil from sides.
Add the brinjal and cook for more 10 minutes.
Add lemon juice and mix well and cook for about 8-10 minutes.
Serve hot garnished with coriander.

recipeDescription: A north indian paneer recipe, saag paneer is a tempting paneer or cottage cheese recipe with chopped saag or palak leaves cooked with succulent paneer cubes.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a pan and add the cumin seeds, coriander seeds and cloves and saute for 10 seconds.
Add the onions, ginger-garlic paste and green chillies, mix well and saute till the onions turn translucent.
Add the tomatoes and cook till they become soft.
Add the salt and coriander powder and mix well.
Add the spinach paste and paneer, mix well and cook for 4 minutes.
Add the milk, mix well and cook for more 3 minutes.
Add the garam masala and kasoori methi, mix well and serve hot.

recipeDescription: The sago upma is a delectable upma recipe with soaked sago or sabudana as ingredient. The sago upma is cooked just like semolina upma with onion, mustard seeds, curry leaves, lime juice and chopped coriander leaves. An excellent breakfast item, sago upma is easy and delicious variation to a traditional rawa upma.
preparationMethod: 1.soak sago overnight in water.drain the water before using.
2.in a bowl put oil,mustards.heat in microwave on high til they splutter.
3. add ginger-garlic paste.hing,onion,green chillies into the bowl and heat on high til onion becomes translucent.
4.put sago,salt,little water.mix well.put on high til sago gets cooked and water is evaporated completely.
5.last put lime,corainder,curry leaves,coconut.mix well.
Serve hot

recipeDescription: Excellent use of leftover dosa batter. . . .
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl and mix well, so as no lumps remain.
Heat a non-stick tava and grease it with oil.
Spread a ladleful of batter evenly to make a thin dosa.
Cook using oil till the dosa turns golden brown and crisp.
Serve hot. .

recipeDescription: Prepare Sandwich in any desired shape and size and fill it up with vegetables, beans , eggs or shredded chicken. Add a slice of cheese and a leaf of lettuce to complete the looks and also to arm yourself with the health benefits.
preparationMethod: First boil the vegelables with some water.
When they are half boiled and let the water dry up using a high flame and stir it continously.
Now add oil to it and lower the flame.
After a one minute add other ingriends and stir fry.
Now put this mixture on bread and cover it with other bread and put it in the sandwich maker
When they are done remove and serve with milk as breakfast or tea as a snack in the evening.

recipeDescription: Good and healthy for children who hate vegetables
preparationMethod: Chopped cucumber,tomato,onion
Then add green chilli sauce,tomato sauce,black pepper,salt mix wll.
Take a bread put in butter bothside
Then put vegetable mixer on bread then put on chess one slide
Put on bread. take this in toaster till light brown.
Ready to serve with onion and tomato sauce

recipeDescription: Sandwich is a simple recipe to prepare vegetable sandwiches with cheese as spread and green coriander chutney as accompaniment. Enjoy the sandwich plain, toasted or grilled as snack or tiffin.
preparationMethod: Mix the malai then mix all ingreients into the malai
take 1 bread & spread all the material on it and cover it with another bread,
Again spread matireal on it and cover it with third bread
Take toster (single one which we use on the gas)
And spread butter on it
And keep that sangwith
And press it very carefully there is no need of closing the toster very tightly
Keep it in your hand
From both sides it starts brown it means it' ready now u can eat this

recipeDescription: Easy and quick.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients in a bwo, excep the pizza bse and mix well.
Take pizza base apply pizza sauce and divide into halfves and the fillings and cover and grill it in sandwich maker untill grilled.
Serve hot

recipeDescription: Simply follow the steps here and recreate the favorite sarson ka saag at home and enjoy it with makke ki roti (breads made from maize flour). The sarson ka saag is prepared from mustard greens and taste heavenly with dollops of butter added on the top.
preparationMethod: Chop spinach and mustard leaves,wash them and drain.
Heat oil in the pressure cooker.
Add drained greens, green chillies and stir.
Add ginger and garlic.
Add few pinches of salt and water.
Pressure cook till done(2 whistles).
Keep aside to cool and then blend to a coarse paste in a mixer.
Heat ghee in a pan, add onion and saute till brown.
Add the coarse paste,garam masala,maize flour and lemon juice.
Stir well and cook till the oil starts to separates.
Garnish with cheese.
Serve hot with makki ki roti or paratha.

recipeDescription: Rose gulukand and elachi is a mouth freshner .
preparationMethod: Spread pan leaf and fill the filling with the above mentioned ingredients. enclose them like envelope. use clove to bind them.

recipeDescription: If toaster is not available at home ,can fry with oil on nonstick frying pan also.
preparationMethod: Take any left over subzi
Add besan chilly ,garlic ,ginger paste ,lemon juice,salt for taste
And coriander
Mix together.
Take bread slice keep the subzi mixture on bread and keep other bread on top of it.
Fry the sandwiches in sandwich toaster.
Similarly do with all the bread slices.
Serve with any sauce or chutney

recipeDescription: You may avoid using green chillies and green coriander if you want.
preparationMethod: Soak sawa ke chawal in water for 1 hour.
Mix singhade ka atta, drained sawa ke chawal, salt, green chilles and green corriander.
Heat oil in a pan.
Divide the mixture in 10 portions.
Make round balls of these portions and flatten it a little.
Fry till golden brown in color.

recipeDescription: A dry mix of leftover rotis shredded into pieces mixed with other ingredients like chillies, corriander, tomatoes, garlic, etc.
preparationMethod: Break the roti in small pieces and keep aside.
Heat oil in kadhai and add the mustard seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the garlic and green chillies and saute for few seconds.
Add the tomates and all the remaining ingredients, mix well and cook till the tomatoes are soft.
Add 1 cup of water and bring it to boil
Add the rotis, mix well and cover and cook till the water dries up and rotis get little soft.
Serve hot garnish with lime and coriander leaves.

recipeDescription: Schezwan Balls is a hot and spicy recipe of deep fried balls made of bread soaked in schezwan sauce.
preparationMethod: Soak the bread slices in water for few seconds.
Add the wet slices to the schezwan sauce.
Add a pinch of salt.
Mesh all the ingredients together.form balls.
Deep fry.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Scraped cauliflower fry is an innovative vegetable recipe with scraped or grated cauliflower stir fried with fried onions, turmeric powder and salt.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a kadai.
Put the mustard seeds.
After mustard seeds splutter add the green chillies and fry for a few seconds and then add the chopped onions.
Fry the onions till they become golden brown.
Then add the scraped cauliflower.
Add salt and turmeric.
Keep frying and the close it keeping it ajar.
After few minutes again fry it. once it is well cooked add the coconut.
It is ready to eat.

recipeDescription: Sdf
preparationMethod: Sdf

recipeDescription: A lovely dinner recipe!
preparationMethod: Sprinkle the pepper on spaghetti and keep aside.
Heat the butter in a broad pan and add the mustard powder.
Add the onions and saute for 2 to 3 minutes.
Add the spaghetti and tomato ketchup and toss well.
Cook for 3 minutes.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Enjoy this tempting non vegetarian seekh kebab recipe with green chutneys and onion rings as starter. The minced meat based seekh kebab is created with a judicious blend of ginger garlic, onion and spice powders and then roasted on a non stick pan with little oil. A delicious grilled starter or snack item.
preparationMethod: Wash mutton mince,drain it well.now mix all left ingredients to the mutton mince.make shapes according to your choice or in length .ready to fry on medium flame.serve with ring onions,mint chutteny.

recipeDescription: A recipe which can be served as a breakfast or a snack. . Serve it piping hot to enjoy it most!
preparationMethod: Combine the tomatoes, onion, green chiiles, coriander, cumin seeds, chaat masala, red chilli powder, salt, garam masala in a bowl and mix well.
Add the fresh cream and semolina and mix well.
Spread the mixture on a bread slice and sprinkle some dry semolina on it.
Heat a non-stick tava, grease it little ghee and place the bread slice with semolina facing downwards.
Apply ghee and cook it from both sides.
Serve hot with coriander chutney or tomato sauce.

recipeDescription: Speedy and charming little biscuits that make an ideal bed partner for your hot beverage of choice!
preparationMethod: Preheat the oven to 175 degree C (350 degree F).
In a bowl, cream together the butter, oil and honey until smooth.
Add the flour and yeast, sesame seeds, baking powder and pistachios and stir to combine.
Drop the dough in small ball shapes on to a nonstick baking tray.
Bake for 9-12 minutes until golden brown.
Allow to cool a few minutes on the baking tray.
Serve.

recipeDescription: If you want to add then tomato round slices in between.
preparationMethod: Take one slice bread spread tomatto ketchup.
After that spred sev.
After that on second slice spread pudina chatni.
Attach them and have it with tea or coffee or any type of milkshake.

recipeDescription: These sandwiches should be served immediately because the sev will become soft if kept for long time
preparationMethod: Spread tomato ketchup on 1 slice of bread & green chutney on another slice.
Put sev or mixture on 1 slice spread it properly & cover it with another slice.
cut it diagonaly.
Serve itimmidiately.

recipeDescription: While boiling eggs add the little vinegar eggs wont crack
preparationMethod: Fry the sevai
Add the ghee
Boil the milk and reduce on low flame
Add the sevai
Garnish with almonds and pistachio and elachi powder
Add the essence

recipeDescription: Seyal paav presents an awesome snack recipe with the pavs or Indian breads dipped in a spicy mixture comprising of ground masalas and chopped tomatoes.
preparationMethod: Wash n cut the corriander leaves,chillies,tomatoes and garlic , now griend all these coursly

Take a pan put oil in it and let it get hot put this ground masala in it add the dry masala n salt as per taste n let is fry on medium heat till the oil comeson the top , now add 1 cup of water to it n then dip the pav in it n let it be made for few min till the water dries .
Serve it hot.

recipeDescription: A delicious karanji made with dates!
preparationMethod: Grind the filling into a paste. Reserve.
Make a stiff dough with all other ingredients except ghee or oil for frying.
Divide the dough into small balls and roll out each to 8 cm disc.
Put a spoon of filling in the center and fold over.
Flute the edges to make a half moon shape.
Make all karanjis and leave to drop on a piece of muslin.
Deep fry in batches till golden and crisp.

recipeDescription: A royal mithai or laddo recipe, Shahi laddo is prepared by mixing together peda( khoya based mithai), sweet petha and chopped nuts.
preparationMethod: Grate the petha sweet and bafi.
Mix both very well.
Mix kaju or badam and cardamom powder to mixture.
Mix well and bind into small laddoos ,it will make 9-10 laddoos.
Cover the laddoos partially with silver foil.
Shahi laddoos are ready to be served.

recipeDescription: Shahi coconut toast is a rich toasted sandwich recipe with a sweet creamy coconut based filling. Enjoy this crispy and sweet toasted bread recipe as dessert or breakfast.
preparationMethod: Grate the coconut(fresh)to a full cup
Grate the burfi(3/4 cup)
Mix them with malai
Take some batter and put in between two slices of bread.
Make toast by applying little ghee(if reqd.) in sandwhich maker.
Serve hot

recipeDescription: Shahi paneer is a traditional paneer recipe prepared in true royal style with paneer cubes sautéed with a rich nut and poppy seeds based paste. The rich and flavoursome paneer dish, Shahi paneer is best reserved for special parties and gatherings.
preparationMethod: Soak the melon seeds in water and grind to a paste. heat butter in a heavy-based pan and add cumin seeds. when the seeds begin to splutter, add ginger and brown very slightly.

Add tomatoes and sauté over medium flame, till the oil separates. add the melon paste, turmeric, coriander, salt, chilli powder and garam masala and sauté over low or medium flame, till the oil separates once again.
Add green chillies along with 2 cubes of crushed paneer and sauté till the green chillies start looking glossy. mix in water and bring to a boil. leave to simmer for 3-4 minutes.
Add paneer cubes, simmer for about 2 minutes and serve hot, garnished with coriander.

recipeDescription: If you like the gravy to be very smooth, then after grinding the gravy strain it and then add the paste and water.
preparationMethod: Heat 2 tbsp of oil in a pan, add the onions and saute till they turn golden brown.
Add the ginger, garlic and chilli paste, mix well and saute till it is brown.
Add the tomatoes and saute for 6 to 8 minutes.
Cool and blend in a mixer to a puree.
Transfer in a kadhai, add 1/2 cup water and bring it to a boil on a slow flame.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a kadhai and deep fry the paneer without browning them. Keep aside.
Add all the dry masala and salt to the puree and mix well.
Add the cashewnut paste and pinch of food colour, mix well and cook on a slow flame,for 5 minutes or till the gravy is thick.
Just before serving, heat the gravy and add the paneer pieces into it.
Serve hot garnish with corinder.

recipeDescription: 1. the dough should be of the chapathis consistency. 2. diamond shapes can be made like this. first cut the chappathis vertically into 1/2 inch strip and then keep the strip horizontally and cut them into small pieces. this will look like a diamond shape.
preparationMethod: Firstly, sieve maida and take it in a bowl, add salt, chilli powder, asafoetida and mix thoroughly with water and knead them thickly to make dough.
Make balls out of the dough and roll them like thin chappatis.
Meanwhile keep oil in a kadai and heat it in a medium flame.
When the oil is heating, cut the chappathis into small diamond shaped pieces with the help of a knife.
Like this, make pieces of each chappati and keep them in each plate.
Now drop all the pieces of one chappati into the oil and fry them until done.
Likewise do for all the rolls and fill it with air tight container.
Kids will enjoy these crispies all the time walking and running around during these summer holidays.

recipeDescription: A very healthy source of folate, fibre and vitamins A,C , D and E.
preparationMethod: Heat Oil in a kadai, add cumin seeds and red chillies.
When the seeds crackle, add the onion, garlic and ginger paste and saute for 2 minutes.
Add the beet puree, garam masala and salt and mix well and cook for 3-4 minutes.
Add the soya nuggets and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot garnished with cream.

recipeDescription: I prepare this for my sons morning snacks you can also add vegetables to tweak it!
preparationMethod: 1. keep water for boiling.
2. when the water starts boiling, add macroni
3. once macroni is boiled in less than 10mins, strain excess water and keep aside
4. heat oil in kadai( preferable non stick pan)
5. add cumin seeds to splutter
6. add cooked macroni
7. add all the above powders mentioned along with salt
8. stir for 1min
macroni is now ready to eat

recipeDescription: A spicy eggplant or brinjal baigan) bharta recipe with roasted brinjals mashed and cooked with onion, tomato and ginger-garlic paste. The baigan bharta recipe is just rightly spiced to suit all palates. A simple yet unique variation to a typical brinjal preparation.
preparationMethod: Place the brinjal in pan, cover with foil and bake in a pre-heated oven at 275 degrees c for 20-30 minutes or until eggplant is soft.
Cool, peel and chop coarsely and keep aside.
Combine the onion, ginger, and garlic and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Heat the oil in a pan, add the pureed mixture and turmeric, mix well and saute for 5 minutes or till the mixture turnd brown.
Add the green chili and 1 tbsp coriander, mix well and saute for more 1 minute.
Add the tomatoes, mix well and simmer 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the brinjal and cook on a medium flame for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the salt, lemon juice, coriander and cumin seeds, mix well and simmer for another 5 minutes.
Serve hot garnished with coriander.

recipeDescription: Simply Delicious Cheese Toast, it is a cheesy and little spicy toast.
preparationMethod: Combine the cheese slices, milk, green chillies, coriander, salt and roasted cumin powder in a blender and grind in to a coarse paste.
Transfer the mixture in a bowl and divide the mixture in to a equal portions.
