recipeDescription: Learn the trick to recreate the magical pani puri at home by preparing the perfect Pani for pani puri. A simple and authentic way for preparing the tangy pani which is to be served with filled puris.
preparationMethod: Soak the tamarind in ½ cup of water for approximately 1 hour. strain out all the pulp through a sieve.
Combine this pulp with the remaining ingredients except the black salt in a blender and grind to a fine paste using a little water.
Transfer the paste into a large bowl and combine with 1 litre of water, the black salt and salt and mix well.
Chill for at least 2 to 3 hours after making so that all the flavours have blended properly.

recipeDescription: Learn the trick to prepare the perfectly crispy and crunchy Papadi (4 chaat) with this simple and step by step instruction list. The papdis are a main ingredient for any chaat recipe, whether as papdi chaat or sev puri and can be prepared in advance and used as desired.
preparationMethod: Mix the flour, ajwain, oil and salt and add enough water to make a firm dough. knead well and roll out into small thin rounds of about 40 mm. (1½") diameter, without using flour if possible. prick with a fork.
Deep fry in hot oil over a medium flame until golden brown and crisp. cool and store in an air-tight container.
Use as required.

recipeDescription: A tasty and chatpata snack made with pieces of paratha mixed with various vegetables and spices.
preparationMethod: Cut the parottas into pieces and keep it aside.
Fry the finely chopped onions and add the gren chillies and add the sauces.
Add the vegetables and fry 4 a min
Now add the parotta pieces ,salt
Sprinkle some water and close the vessel with a plate.
After a minute remove the plate and mix well.then add chilly powder.and again fry well.
Garnish with coriander leaves and spring onions.

recipeDescription: A lovely past Pizza recipe which is sure to be loved by all, especially the children. The pizza base is spread with tomato paste and topped with boiled pasta which is tossed with veggies and cheese before baking.
preparationMethod: Heat butter
Fry the garlic
Add in the onions n saute for some time.
Then add the capsicum n cook till they turn soft
Add the puree n give it one boil.
Add the sauce,chilli pwd, salt.
Then add in the macroni n noodles.
Cook for 2-3 min.
Let it cool.
Spread this on top of the pizza base.
Garnish it with grated cheese
N bake till cheese turns a little brown.

recipeDescription: A lightly seasoned pasta soup is sure to make your winter evenings warmer. The pasta and vegetables added to the pasta soup will sufficiently fill you up and is quite soothing as well.
preparationMethod: Make the pasta as direction of the packet.
Put oil in another pan.
Then put onions, tomatoes and mashed slightly.
After, the onion and tomatoes are mashed, put in the ready pasta.
Put salt as required.
For seasoning you can put butter/cheese.

recipeDescription: The moong cooked in iron vessel will become black in colour but it is full of iron and will be very delicious and it is very tasty. you can serve it as snacks also. kids like it most.
preparationMethod: Soak green sabut moong in a steel bowl for about 6-7 hours, without salt. take an iron kadahi and put on the flame. add refined oil, when it is hot, put hing and jeera. when it gets brown, strain the moong from water, don’t throw the water. put strained moongs in the kadahi and add salt and red chilli, sauté all this for about 5 minutes, now

recipeDescription: A combination of grapes and tangy lime. . . A refreshing drink!!
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl and mix well.
Place some ice in each serving glass and pour the juice over ice.
Serve chilled.

recipeDescription: An excellent snack for all time especially when in a jiffy.
preparationMethod: Combine all the other ingredients expect the pasta and oil and add a little water to make a smooth batter.
Add the pasta and keep aside for 5 minutes.
Heat the oil in a kadhai and deep fry the pastas till they turn crisp and golden brown in colour.
Serve hot with garlic chutney or mayonnaise.

recipeDescription: Biscuits baked with a batter of maida, ghee, eggs and pepper powder
preparationMethod: Take ghee,salt,pepper,beaten egg and mix well
Add maida and baking powder to it make it like a chapathi dough then roll it till u get 1/4 thickness
Then cut it in the biscuit cutter in req shape
Bake in preheated oven upto 10-15 min on 350 degrees

recipeDescription: When u know that it is going to bubble it is better to switch of the gas. if u over boil then it looses its flavour and taste
preparationMethod: Mash with ur hand tomatoe, coriander leaves, turmeric powder, salt, and pour the lime juice to it and add the water according to ur wish
Pepper and jeera whould be powdered properly and added to this mixture.

Heat oil in a pan and allow the mustard to splutter and then add the fenugreek seed, mash the garlic without peeling and add it then put the hing powder and soon after u get the smell of the hing pour the mixture into this and allow it to boil.
Dont allow it to over boil as soon as u see it bubbling switch of the gas.
Now ur pepper water is ready.

recipeName: Perfect Pizza(easy, Tasty, No Oven Needed)
recipeDescription: 1) the best cheese to be used is mozzarella cheese only. it melts very quickly and tastes real good. 2) if you are using capsicum as one of you toppings, make sure u slice it horizontally and keep it thin. please do not overcook capsicum. let it remain half-cooked. 3) you may add toppings and spices of your choice besides the ones mentioned above. 4) while making pizza in the oven let the toppings be totally raw. they will be cooked during grilling. 4) in case of a pan, the toppings need to be cooked separately since we would be keeping the pizza in the pan only to melt the cheese. keep the flame low or the crust may get too hard.
preparationMethod: Heat oil in a pan.
When oil is hot enough, put ginger-garlic paste, chillies, the finely chopped onions, pepper, salt to taste.
Saute the mixture for five minites on a little high flame.
Take the base, put a thick layer of the pizza sauce all over the base.
Take some oil in another pan and saute the toppings in the oil for 3 mins.
Put some part of the toppings over the base. grate mozarella cheese over the pizza.
Then put the remaining toppings over the base and put cheese over it again.
Keep this base in a hot pan. heat till cheese melts.(this hardly takes any time).
As soon as the cheese melts remove the pizza from the pan.

In case you have an oven, you may skip the 5th step where the toppings are sauted separately in a pan and directly put raw toppings and cheese on the pizza base. keep the pizza in the oven to be grilled for 10 mins.
Sprinkle oregano over the pizza. tasty, yummy pizza is ready!!

recipeDescription: This recipe is just the right for people who don't want to do much and want it to be quick :)
preparationMethod: First apply butter on both sides of the slice.
Then spread some pesto sauce on it and make sure that no empty spaces are left.
Then keep the cheese slice in top of the bread slice.
Next sprinkle some dried basil on it.
Then sprinkle some capsicum on it.
After that take a preheated oven of about 200 degrees.
And keep the slices on the grill and keep for 5 to 7 mins or till the slices become golden brown.

recipeDescription: You will get a pimple free & glowing face when used on daily basis.
preparationMethod: Add gram flour & multani mitti in to a small bowl
Pour the milk into it & make a thick paste
Apply it on your face throughly
Leave for 20 mins.
Then pat it with water and rub like the scrub.
Wash the face with water.

recipeDescription: Polenta with parmesan cheese presents a traditional recipe of preparing Italian favorite polenta sprinkled with cheese. The polenta is chilled and then
preparationMethod: Bring water to a boil in a 2-quart saucepan and slowly add polenta, whisking constantly. cook polenta over moderate heat, whisking constantly, 5 minutes. remove from heat and whisk in cheese, butter, and salt and pepper to taste. serve immediately.

recipeDescription: This is one of the best recipe for hot summer and it is my sons favourite iced tea.
preparationMethod: Mix all the ingredients properly and blend in the mixer for a minute and serve chilled.

recipeDescription: The above recipe is useful in case of upset stomach. the motions will be controlled immediately on consumption of this kashai. this could be had about 2 to 3 times in a day. always keep the dried pomegranate skins handy at home)
preparationMethod: Wash and clean the pomegranate skin and boil it in a glass of water until it reduces to half a glass.strain and drink.
1.blend all the ingredients in a blender.strain & serve immedietly.

recipeDescription: Very good for digestion and acts as a coolant for the stomach:)
preparationMethod: 1.powder the ingredients separately in a dry grinder
2.mix the powdered ingredients together and preserve in glass bottle(air tight)

recipeDescription: This water is very useful for gas relief and stomach pain due to gas.
preparationMethod: Take water in a small pan put it on flame.
Add asafoetida, black pepper powder and salt.
Remove the pan when water starts to boil.
Add lime or lemon juice in it and serve hot.

recipeDescription: A delicious and sinful chocolate milkshake filled with oodles o chocolate syrup and chocolate malt.
preparationMethod: Mix all in blender for 30 seconds. serve immediately for best results.

recipeDescription: Prepare Upma with semolina and vegetable and serve hot as breakfast. The suji or rawa are roasted and cooked with onion, mustard seeds, curry leaves, lime juice and chopped coriander leaves. An excellent fiber rich snack item, Upma is easy to prepare and delicious.
preparationMethod: Same as below

recipeDescription: It is really effective & can be given to children also.the powder can be made & stored also for future use.
preparationMethod: Roast the jeera in a dry kadai till it turns black.
Cool it & powder it.
Add 1/4 tbsp of the powder to 20ml of hot water & drink it immediately.
Take for atleast 4 times a day.

recipeDescription: A simple and quick to make cooler. . Refreshing in summers!
preparationMethod: Combine the vanilla ice-cream and coke and blend in a mixer till slushy and smooth.
Transfer in serving glasses with ice.
Serve immediately.

recipeDescription: Boiled egg adds extra nutrition and proteins. Serve with hot rotis.
preparationMethod: Soak soya in hot water for 10 min .add salt to water and boil in the same water for 10-15 min .
For the gravy :
Make a fine paste of onion, ginger ,garlic, chillies and coriander.

Heat oil in a pan,add the paste to the oil and fry till gravy is fried and oil is released. add chopped or pureed tomato to the gravy and cook for 1-2 min. add salt,turmeric powder,chilli powder,garam masala and the cooked soya flakes/chunks. mix all ingredients and add 1/2 cup water and pressure cook for 1 whistle.cut the boiled egg into rings and

recipeDescription: It is best for children and if add butter can make it a party dish.
preparationMethod: Heat the pan add oil and ginger garlic paste 1 tbsp and saute till brown.
Add the onions and cook till golden brown. add the tomato grated and masalas and cook till fat seperates the tomatoes.
Add the boiled vegegtables or non boiled according to choice and cook for 10 mins.
Serve with corriander leaves or the top.

recipeDescription: Healthy and colorful vegetable pancake recipe with veggies mixed with fresh cream and sauce and then applied on the bread slices. These veg pancakes are then cooked on a hot tawa till brown.
preparationMethod: Mix all veg with fresh cream and salt (the mixture should not be too tight or too soft).
Place it on one side of the bread loaf.

Heat the tava and place the bread slice with the mixture over it facing the tava. medium the gas and cook till one side is light brown. turn the slice to cook the other side of the bread. when done serve hot with chilli sauce and tomato sauce.

recipeDescription: Veg.korma is a mixed vegetable recipe in a rich, tasty curry. The flavorsome, mildly spiced and creamy veg.korma taste awesome with rotis or paranthas.
preparationMethod: Heat oil in a pan and add mustard seeds.once seeds begins to splutter add one cup water in a pan and let boil the water.
Add all vegetables alongwith salt,cook for 10 minutes over medium heat.
Grind together, the coconut,green chillies and cumin seeds to a paste.
Whisk the yoghurt well,mix-in coconut paste.
Add to the vegetables and bring to a boil.
Cover the pan and leave to simmer until vegetables become tender.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: A cholesterol-free version of the tasty mayonnaise made with soy milk and without eggs.
preparationMethod: Put all the ingredients except the oil in a blender.
Blend on the lowest speed.
Add the oil one drop at a time until the mixture starts to thicken.
Do not rush this or it will not emulsify! continue blending until thickened and smooth.
Transfer to a jar and store in the refrigerator

recipeDescription: Here is a delicious Vegetable combo recipe which is sure to satiate your hunger and delight your taste buds with the choice of vegetables stir fried in select spice powders, cream and dressings.
preparationMethod: Preheat oven at 350 degree.
Spread pizza sauce on pizza base.
After that spread pav bhaji's bhaji on sauce.
Now sprinkle some taco seasoning sauce on it.
Sprinkle greated cheese on it.
Now bake ready pizza in the oven at 350 degree for 15 to 20 minutes or till cheese gets melt and bubbly.

Mix all ingredients and make small balls.flatten a little.heat a non stick pan.grease with oil.place the pattieson the pan and coverwith lid.after 5 mins.turn it and again cover it till it becomes crispy.serve hot with chutney/sauce.

recipeDescription: Usual methods of making vegetable korma are very time consuming as the vegetables take a while to cook. However, this simple recipe to cook it in a pressure cooker helps save time and give u a delicious dish!
preparationMethod: Heat oil in a pressure cooker, add the cardamom powder and onions and saute till the onions turn translucent.
Add the ginger paste, garlic paste, green chilli paste and cashewnut paste and saute for 2 minutes.
Add the coriander seeds powder and mix well and cook for 5 minutes.
Add the vegetables, mix well and saute for 3 minutes.
Add enough water, ,mix well and pressure cook for 2-3 whistles or till cooked.
Allow the steam to escape before opening the lid.
Add the salt and milk and mix well and bring to boil.
Simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve hot garnished with coriander.

recipeDescription: If you don't have long bread then take 2 bread slices stick them with milk and roll them. <>you can serve this sandwich by cutting only and you can also bake these rolled slices.
preparationMethod: Mash the vegetable roughly add enough green chutney and chili sauce to bind the vegetable.
Remove crust from bread slice, roll it to make it thinner .
Apply butter and tomato sauce and spread vegetable .
Roll bread slice tightly and cover it with wet cloth and keep it in fridge for 1 hour to set and then cut into slices.

recipeDescription: vegetable potpourri is truly an amazing mixed vegetable recipe. A simple, irrestible choice of masala with assorted vegetables makes it a special baked dish. Relish vegetable potpourri with grated paneer as topping.
preparationMethod: Heat oil and fry the onions for a minute.
Add the crushed ginger garlic and sauté for a second.
Now add the bell-pepper and tomatoes and fry again for 2 minutes.
Add the mixed veggies, chili powder, garam masala, fresh coriander and salt.
Cook for 2 minutes.
Spread tomato sauce on top. sprinkle grated paneer over it.
Bake in a hot oven at 200 deg c for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with garlic bread.

recipeDescription: Vegetable sandwich is a simple and yet so popular sandwich recipe. The medley of vegetables get added as a filling along with cheese and seasoning powders and can be relished plain or grilled with ketchup.
preparationMethod: Cut the cucumber onion tomato
In to thin slices
Cut the bread pieces diagonally
Place the slices of the vegetables on the bread pieces
Sprinkle salt and black pepper on it.
Serve by decorating it with coriander leaves

recipeDescription: In hot summer season one has to drink much more water, and watermelon is such a fruit which completes our requirement, here is slush which is combination of watermelon and lychee
preparationMethod: In a mixer jar combine all the ingredients,grind the same.
Pour into individual serving glass.
Serve.

recipeDescription: Cooling and refreshing for skin and stomach. Good for summers.
preparationMethod: Add rose syrup to cold water.
Add the falooda seeds to it and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
Grind in a mixture 1 cup of watermelon.
Add this juice to the above mixture and refrigerate it.
Keep the balance of chopped watermelon in refrigerator.
While serving, take individual glasses, put some chopped watermelon pieces to it.
Pour the above mixture on to it.
Garnish it with fresh rose petals and serve chilled.

recipeDescription: An easy and refreshing watermelon juice recipe. Enjoy!
preparationMethod: Combine the watermelon,lemon,honey and mint leaves in a mixer and blend to a smooth juice. Strain the juice.
In each glass, place 1/4 cup of crushed ice. Pour equal quantity of the juice over it.
Garnish with mint leaves. Serve immediately.

recipeDescription: A refreshing summer drink, watermelon punch is a favorite among children. The fresh and cooling watermelon flavors in the watermelon punch when served chilled is sure to reenergize you on a hot sultry day.
preparationMethod: Peel the ginger,crush it and take out the juice.
Cut the watermelon into small pieces,removing the seeds.
Put it in a mixer and strain out the juice.
To the strained watermelon juice,add lemon juice,ginger juice,rose syrup,salt and pepper.
Serve topped with crushed ice.

recipeDescription: This ganesh festival..make these delicous laddoos..
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl and mix well.
Take 3 tsp of mixture and make ladoos with light hand.
Roll them up in a dry coconut powder and keep aside.
Serve then garnished with tender rose petals.
Serve soft fresh ladoo at room temperature with almonds.

recipeName: White chocolate flanwith dark chocolate sauce
recipeDescription: Attarctive and easy to make.
preparationMethod: Melt the butter in a large sauce-pan,
Add the biscuits and mix well.
Butter an loose based round tin and press the biscuits into the base using your hands or by back of spoon.
Freeze until cold. mean while, melt the white chocolate in double boiler or in the micro wave once the chocolate has melted, leave to cool.
Whisk the cream until it is quiet thick. add 2 tsp of whipped cream to the white chocolate and stir it in.
Pour the rest of the chocolate into the cream and mix well.
pour into the tin and chill until firm
. for the chocolate sauce-- .make the sauce by putting all the ingredients in a saucepan with 1cup of milk and bring to a simmer,stirring.
Simmer until the mixture thickens and then cool.
Decorate the top of the flan by putting polika dots and re-warm the rest and serve it with flan.

recipeDescription: White chole is a popular chole( white kabuli chana) recipe with a difference. The white chole or kabuli chanas are cooked with onion, ginger, garlic, spices and coconut milk to create a culinary delight.Add a teaspoon of the green and sweet chutney on the top and serve the white chole garnished with coriander leaves.
preparationMethod: Safed chane ubaal kar uska paani chaanlo, phir uble chano main sookha pisa hua dhania , bhuna jeera, thodi si kaali mirch pisa hua long anaardana bhi pisa hua sab cholon main mix kar lo phir paani daalo , jo chana tha ,aur ubaal lo jab gadha ho jaaye to oil garam kar ke ooper se daal do, pehle hi boiled the ab to bas gada karna hai..garnish with gr

tag: Which Idlis and Dosas are healthy
recipeDescription: Serve this winter vegetable hot dhokla to your loved ones with hot masala tea.
preparationMethod: Keep dhokla steamer to boil.
Combine all the ingredients and make a smooth semi thick batter. Heat water and add soda to it.
Put this mixture into the batter and mix well.
Pour the mixture into the greased thalis and steam it for 20 minutes.
Let the steam evaporate, cut into pieces and serve fresh.
While serving, heat the tempering and pour it on to the dhokla pieces.
Garnish it with coriander, coconut and anar dana.
Serve it with tea, chunda and chutney.

recipeName: Wonder Basil ( Tulsi and Amla Drink)
recipeDescription: A quick method to get relief from cold.
preparationMethod: Wash the tulsi leaves and amla and mash it using a mortar-pestle.
Add the mixture to 1/2 cup of water and mix well.
Boil for 4 minutes to reduce its quantity.
Filter and serve warm.

recipeDescription: A delicious zero oil soup which is a must try although the combination of broccoli and yam is not so very common!
preparationMethod: Combine the yam, broccoli and garlic cloves along with 2 cups water in a pressure cooker and pressure cook for 2 whistles or till cooked.
Allow steam to escape before opening the lid.
Cool slightly and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Transfer this mixture into the pan, add the sago, mix well and boil for 5-7 minutes.
Add the salt, pepper and chaat masala and mix well.
Just before serving, add the spring onions and sesame seeds.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Zamali Fenugreek Eggs, a variation to a regular egg burji. Serve hot with naan or paratha.
preparationMethod: Wash, drain and chopped the fenugreek leaves, put the leaves in a bowl add enough water, l/2 tsp turmeric powder, mix well and keep aside.
Heat the oil in kadhai, add the garlic, whole green chillies, cumin seeds and onion and saute till the onions turn translucent.
Add the chilli powder, reaming turmeric powder and salt, mix well and cook on a medium flame for 2 minutes.
Drain the fenugreek leaves and add to kadhai, mix well and cook for 3 minutes on a medium flame.
Add the eggs, mix well, cover it and cook on a slow flame till the eggs are cooked.
Serve hot and garnish with coriander.

recipeDescription: These dosas are filling and very tasty and healthy.
preparationMethod: Mix all the ingridients well and keep aside for 10 minutes.then in non stick pan pour 1 tsp oil and spred the batter as thick or thin you want,then cover it .when one side is cooked,cook the other side.
When both sides are cooked your dosa is ready.
Serve it with green chateny or sause.

recipeDescription: Zatpat papad nu shak is a quick vegetable recipe which can be made into minutes for sudden visitors. The roasted papads are cooked with masala and served hot garnished with coriander leaves with rotis.
preparationMethod: Make papad in midium pieces,and chopped onian,take kadai .
Vaghar onian with oil and jeera,fried it 2to3 minute
Add papad and saute it 2,3 minute then add 1 small glass of water and add all masala and cooked it for 5 minute and serve it hot.
Your papad nu shak is ready to eat and quick.

recipeDescription: As the name suggests, a quick snack for those times when you can't find anything else to eat. Add more ingredients to spice it up. You need not be an expert cook to prepare this one.
preparationMethod: Mix grated tomatoes,onions,cucumber,beet root, chutney & chaat masala in a bowl.
Cut borders of the bread slice.
Apply mixture from bowl between bread slice.
Serve with tomato sauce.

recipeDescription: Zesty Boldly Mary is a tangy cocktail with tomato puree and vodka. Perfect party during for those above 18.
preparationMethod: Combine tomato juice,tomato puree, vodka, worcestershire sauce, lime juice, and tabasco sauce in a 2-quart pitcher; stir well.
Serve over ice.
Garnish with lime or celery.

recipeDescription: Substitute methi with spinach or spring onions. These need not be boiled before adding to the recipe.
preparationMethod: Boil 3 cups water in a deep pan, add the methi leaves and simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Drain, wash again and keep aside.
Heat oil in a pan and add the mustard seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the asafoetida, tomatoes, all dry masalas, mix well and cook on a slow flame till the oil separates.
Add a tbsp of water,mix well and bring to a boil.
Add the fenugreek leaves, mix well and cook on a slow flame till oil separates.
Serve hot with thin hot chappatis or phulkas.

recipeDescription: A deep fried flat bread recipe with flavours of methi leaves or fenugreek leaves, Methi mathis (mathri) taste best wit aloo ki subzi or pickle.
preparationMethod: Knead together plain flour, salt, fenugreek and 100 ml oil and water to make dough.
Keep aside for 10 minutes. make 25 small balls out of it.
Using a rolling pin, make flat discs with each ball (eash 4 cm in diameter and 2 mm thick).
Heat oil in a wok and fry them in batches on medium-low flame for about 8-10 minutes, till light brown in colour.
Keep aside to cool. serve at rom temperature.

recipeDescription: All time favourite....Methi pakora is Indian snack of fried fritters.it's tea time snack
preparationMethod: In a mixing bowl, take ¼ cup methi leaves, onions, green chilli, ginger, 2red chilli powder, turmeric, asafoetida,baking soda, and salt ,add ¾ cup besan and ¼ cup water and mix well into a smooth batter. keep the batter covered for 5 to 6 minutes.
Heat oil for shallow frying or deep frying in a kadai or pan, add spoonfuls of the methi pakora batter to the hot oil.
Deep fry till they turn golden brown and crisp from sides.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Methi saag is a traditional north indian punjabi vegetable dish with fenugreek greens. The spicy and rich methi saag is best paired with rotis and is a delicious way of sneaking in health on the plate.
preparationMethod: Boil the brinjal cubes in enough water for 5 minutes.
Add the methi leaves along with little salt, mix well and cook for 10 minutes.
Remove form the flame and keep aside.
Heat a pan and add the tomato slices with little water and becomes a thick paste.
Add this tomato mixture to the methi mixture and mix well. Keep aside.
Heat the oil in a pan, add the soya granules and fry till thye turn crisp.
Add this to the methi mixture and mix well. Keep aside.
Heat the oil in a small pan and add the mustard seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the green chilies, red chilli and saute for 10 seconds.
Add this to the methi mixture, salt and mix well.
Serve hot garnished with coriander.

recipeDescription: Get ready to pack a healthy Methi sandwich as lunches or picnic snacks. The bread slices re spread with a green chutney comprising of methi leaves, coriander leaves and chillies.
preparationMethod: Chop all the vegetables ( except the lemon) into small pieces & mix them
Squeeze the lemon juice & add the salt.
Prepare this about 5 mins before .( as the methi will become wet & all juice will come out)
Apply butter to both the sides of the bread
Apply chutni to one of the bread piece --or if not needed -leave it plain.
Place the veg. mix on the other bread piece & cover with the other piece.
Heat it in a toaster.
Ready to eat

recipeDescription: It's a wonderful combination of vitamin c and good for digetion too. can be consumed from day one , but for storing it we need to dry it in sun.
preparationMethod: Wash the methi seeds
Mix all ingredients in a glass bowl
Pop and taste it is ready the salt
Put the contents in a glass container and leave it sun for few days.
Keep shaking it whenever you find time
Once dry you can store it bring inside.

recipeDescription: Methi-palak soup is able to aptly incorporate the goodness of greens like fenugreek or methi leaves and palak or spinach leaves in to a tasty healthy green soup. Enjoy this healthful thick and hot soup with croutons as topping and toasted bread slices as side dish.
preparationMethod: Put oil in a non-stick vessal
Add chopped garlic pieces. let them fry till golden brown
Add cut tomato piceces.
Add methi leaves, plucked and washed and cut.
Add palak leaves, cut and washed.
Add water and let it boil for around 10 mins.
Add salt
Strain and serve hot.

recipeDescription: Mexican cuisine is quite an interesting, colorful and varied . The Mexican bean soup brings forth the true colours of Mexican cooking by adding beans in a hot soup recipe with chopped tomatoes and herbs.
preparationMethod: Cook baked beans in broth for 3-4 minutes.
Add salt, parsley, pepper, and 1 tbsp cheese.
Cook for a minute.
Remove from flame. add cheese and crumble tortilla chips on the top before serving.

recipeDescription: Mexican Bhel Puri an innovative version of the our Indian bhel.
preparationMethod: Cut flour tortillas in 1” squares and deep fry in oil till golden brown; keep aside.
Place the refried beans in a large saucepan, cover the beans with 1 inch of water, and stir in 1 pk of taco seasoning mix. Place over low heat for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Place enchilada sauce in another sauce pan and mix with small can of tomato sauce.
Add cumin powder, chili powder and salt to taste; use water as needed to achieve desired consistency.
Bring to a boil over high heat, and then reduce heat to low, and simmer for 5 minutes.
Now take fried tortillas in a serving plate, topped with hot seasoned refried beans and enchilada sauce mix.
Sprinkle cheddar cheese to get melt.
And mix all the other ingredients to it: onions, green paper, and shredded lettuce.
Topped with chopped fresh cilantro.
One can add salsa and jalapeño if like really hot.

recipeDescription: An innovative Mexican Dosa recipe is basically Crepe stuffed with assorted pepper, jalapeno and salsa. An unique and unusual Mexican cuisine inspired filling for the South Indian delicacy Dosa.
preparationMethod: Take one tortilla and spread some chili paste according to your spice level. Then spread 2 table spoon of beans in triangular shape.
Then place some tomatoes n capsicum on it.
Bend the tortilla from the three sides to give a triangular shape.
Heat a non stick pan on medium high.
Put some butter on it and place the tortilla on the pan with folded side on the bottom.
Let it cook for one minute and then turn it upside down to cook the other side for 1 minute till little brownish tinch.
Serve it with salsa sauce or pasta sauce.

recipeDescription: A quick way of preparing the traditional cauliflower recipe in the microwave is presented by this microwave recipe - gobhi musallam. The cauliflower is enrobed in a delectable spicy tomato and onion based paste and then served hot.
preparationMethod: Combine 2 tbsp water, lemon juice and the salt in a bowl and keep aside.
Cut off the stem of the cauliflower right till the base. Prick with a sharp knife all over.
Place the cauliflower in a deep microwave safe bowl and sprinkle with the lemon juice mixture all over and around it.
Microwave on high for 5 minutes, or till almost cooked, but firm.
Remove from the dish and keep aside.
In another microwave safe bowl, put the oil and microwave on high for 20 seconds.
Add the onions and microwave on high for 2 minutes, stirring once in between.
Add the grated onions, ginger and garlic paste, mix well and microwave on high for 1 minute.
Add the coriander powder, cumin seeds powder, chilli powder, turmeric, salt, tomatoes and tomato puree, mix well and microwave on high for 3 minutes, stirring once after 1 1/2 minutes.
Place the cauliflower upside-down in the microwave safe dish and cover with the gravy and microwave on high for 2 minutes, again turn and microwave on high for 2 minutes.
Serve hot garnished with coriander, cardamom powder and garam masala.

recipeDescription: An popular chutney recipe, mint chutney with chopped mint leaves(pudina leaves) blended with garlic, salt, onion and other greens like coriander and spices is an amazing accompaniment to meals or snacks.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients and blend in a mixer into a smooth paste, adding a little water if required.
Add the lemon juice, salt and anardana powder and mix well.
Serve immediately or store refrigerated.

recipeDescription: An popular chutney recipe, mint chutney with chopped mint leaves(pudina leaves) blended with garlic, salt, onion and other greens like coriander and spices is an amazing accompaniment to meals or snacks.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Serve immediately or store refrigerated.

recipeDescription: The cooling and delicious mint chutney can be prepared and stored in refrigerator in an air tight container. Enjoy this mint chutney as dressing, spread or dip with starters and snacks.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Serve immediately or store refrigerated.

recipeDescription: Twist to the mint by adding a dash of lemon juice is very refreshing in hot summers.
preparationMethod: Put 2 1/2 cups water to boil and add mint leaves to it.
Allow the mint leaves to be in water for around 4-5 mins or till it starts giving smell.
Cool this mixture and blend in a mixer along withsalt ,jaljeera powder and lemon juice well.
Strain and refrigerate till chill.
Just before serving, add the soda and serve chilled.

recipeDescription: A simple recipe to prepare the popular accompaniment to any starter, pakoda, cutlet or bread spread, mint and coriander chutney. The mint and coriander leaves rte blended together with salt, lime juice and garlic and then can be refrigerated and used as desired.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Store in an airtight container or refrigerate for up to one week.

recipeDescription: Minty Cooler, mint flavour base chilled and refreshing drink.
preparationMethod: Grind the mint leaves to a smooth paste, using little water.
Add the grounded paste to 5 cups of water, mix well and strain the water into a pitcher.
Add the honey, salt and lemon juice to the mint water and mix well.
Refrigerate the minty water till chill.
Put few ice-cubes in a glasses and pour the minty cooler in equal quantity in each glasses.
Serve chilled and garnish with mint leaves and a lemon slice.

recipeDescription: A delicious chillied iron fortified drink to help rejuvinate yourself.
preparationMethod: Combine the pomegranate juice, lemon juice and mint leaves and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Just before serving, add the soda and serve chilled.

recipeDescription: Delicious, healthy and nutritious breakfast liked by even your children.
preparationMethod: Mixed all the ingriedients well except oil. make batter with thin consistency.keep the batter for 10 minutes. put the nonstick pan on knob.put some oil on hot nonstick pan.fry from one side, afterwards on another side. serve with green coriander chutney or tomato sauce.

recipeDescription: These are for the tiresome kids after school to enjoy a mixture of fruits and chocolates and mixed nuts to be put in cone for attracting them. This dessert can also be served on a birthday party too.
preparationMethod: Brush 5 ice-cream cones with melted chocolate from the inner side and till half from the outer side.
Put 1 tsp of melted white chocolate inside each cone and put some choco chips so the they stick at the bottom.
Now top with 2 tsp of chopped mixed fruits and sprinkle some mixed nuts.
Top with cherries and tooti fruity as desired and keep in refrigerator for 5 minutes or till set.
Serve chilled.

recipeDescription: This drink is loved by kids and youth as well.
preparationMethod: Make jelly and refrigerate. in a tall glass put a little jelly, add icecream and pour chilled soda and serve immediatly.

recipeDescription: This is a great winter drink, colourful and delicious!
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients ans mix well.
Add ice as required.
Pour in a glass, add mint juice and parsley.
Serve immediately.

recipeDescription: a delicious sweet mocktail.
preparationMethod: Place strawberries, ice cubes, milk and grenadine in a blender. Blend until smooth. Add more ice or less depending on your taste. Pour it in the serving glass. Top it with fresh whipped cream and decorate it with strawberry slices.

recipeDescription: Don't stir serve as it is
preparationMethod: In a serving glass squeez half lemon, add 1 tbsp roohafza into it.don't stir and add ice then add sprite immediately .decorate with a mint leaf. serve. do same with remaining ingredient.
Blend the cherry and strawberry together with an electric mix
Pour this saucy mixture on to top of the biscuits

recipeDescription: Prepare the eye catching and tempting pinwheel sandwich easily with this recipe. The boiled vegetables are added with tomato sauce as spread in the bread slices. Cut the bread roll into pinwheels and serve as packed lunch options for children. They are sure to love this healthy, tasty and attractive sandwiches.
preparationMethod: Roll each slice bread with a rollingpin.
Put water on the edge of each slice & put another slice on it & roll again.
Mix all other ingredients except sauce & put on slice roll tightly & put in freezer for 5 minutes.
Cut into thin slices& serve with sauce.

recipeDescription: A luscious dessert recipe, Pistachio cream pudding has pistachio pudding sandwiched between layers of sweetened cream.
preparationMethod: Follow the procedure on the packet of the pudding & prepare the pistachio pudding & set it aside.
Crush the ritz crackers & mix it with butter. set this mixture in the bottom of the pan like a crust.
Mix the vanilla icecream with the pistachio pudding together & pour it on the crust.
Now put the whipcream on the top & put it in fridge to set.
You will have like 3 layers.decorate it with favorite fresh fruit.

recipeDescription: This is one of our favorite recipe try it out,
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a kadhai and add the mustard seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the turmeric powder, asafoetida, water, chilli powder,coriander powder and salt and mix well.
When water start boiling add besan with little water to avoid lumps or balls, while stirring immediately.
Keep stirring for 4-5 minutes.
Take one greased thali and transfer cooked besan in it.
Then flatten with your fingers.
Cut into square shape or any shape of your choice.
Garnish with coriander and coconut.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Pizza muffins is a unique recipe with very few ingredients.We just feel the aroma of pizza from the oven when it is baking.
preparationMethod: In a large bowl whisk together flour,baking powder,italian seasoning,salt.
Take another bowl whisk together milk,eggs,oil .Slowly add flour stir until it is just moistened.
Stir in cheese,red bellpepper.Pour the batter slowly in each muffin cup so that it fills upto 3/4 cup
sprinkle cheese over muffins.On top add small tomato slice cut side up.
Preheat the oven and bake 375F for about 25 min or until the top portion is firm.

recipeDescription: Pizza sandwich is a fun sandwich using herbed Italian bread which is topped with zesty salad bound with vegetables and cheese.
preparationMethod: I use this recipe when i'm craving a pizza and don't have time to make one the traditional way. or when i don't even want to order.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees
Spread pizza sauce on slices of bread.
Sprinkle cheese.
Sprinkle the chopped veggies
Sprinkle oregano leaves
Bake in oven for 7-8 minutes.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Pizza toast is an amazing open sandwich recipe with sauces and toppings added just like the ones added on pizzas. The bread serves as a pizza base and the grated cheese and chopped spring onion tossed in tobasco sauce as the delicious topping.
preparationMethod: Take a slice of bread put the sauces on it [told above]
Put the shreded cheese on it .
Then keep spring onions on it put some chaat masala on it.
Put thanya on top.[optional]heat for two min in microwave.
Then take it out and heat on tavah for3 min serve hot .

recipeDescription: Pizza toast is an amazing open sandwich recipe with sauces and toppings added just like the ones added on pizzas. The bread serves as a pizza base and the grated cheese and chopped spring onion tossed in tobasco sauce as the delicious topping.
preparationMethod: On the toast spread the sauce.
Put mixed chopped vegetables put cheese on top.
Sprinkle salt & pepper.
Put the toast in oven/microwave on high heat for 2mins.
Voila,scrumptuos nutritious pizza-toasts ready.

recipeDescription: Pizzas with paneer is a wonderful combination so make sure you try it.
preparationMethod: Combine the cream cheese and tomato sauce in a bowl and mix well. Keep aside.
Heat the oil in a pan add the garlic, paneer and salt, mix well and cook for 2 minutes. Remove from the flame and keep aside.
Take a pizza base on a flat surface and spread the cheese-tomato mixture evenly on the base, on top of it spread the paneer mixture and beans.
Finally spread the cheese on top of the pizza.
Bake in a oven at 200 degree celsius for 15-20 minutes.
Serve hot.
